characters: THROUGH THE HOLE IN THE CEILING--
DESTRUCT WARNINGS". THEN DIES. FOX SMILES TO HIMSELF.
THE ENTIRE WAREHOUSE IS AN ENORMOUS EXPLOSION-
GORDON TAKES THE AXE TO THE BAT SYMBOL- SPARKING, SMASHIN
HAND, WATCHED BY AN ASSORTMENT OF COPS AND REPORTERS...
BEHIND HIM IS A LARGE PHOTOGRAPH OF DENT SMILING.
OFFERS HIS OWN WRISTS TO THE OFFICERS
GUARDSMEN ALL LISTEN AS THE JOKER'S VOICE RINGS OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man in a CLOWN MASK holding a SMOKING SILENCED PISTOL e a shell casing.  This is DOPEY.  He turns to a second man HAPPY, also in clown mask, who steps forward with a CABLE LAUNCHER, aims at a lower roof across the street and FIRE cable across.  Dopey secures the line to an I-beam line-  CLAMP on- sends a KIT BAG out then steps OUT the window..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...into space.  The men SLIDE across the DIZZYING DROP... landing on the lower roof across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MAN on the corner, back to us, holding a CLOWN MASK.  A SUV pulls up.  The man gets in, puts on his mask.  Inside the car- two other men wearing CLOWN MASKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three of a kind.  Let's do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Clowns looks up from loading his automatic wea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it?  Three guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's two on the roof.  Every guy  is an extra share.  Five shares is  plenty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six shares.  Don't forget the guy  who planned the job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?  He thinks he can sit it out  and still take a slice, then I get  why they call him the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grumpy cocks his weapon.  Bozo pulls the car over in fron of the GOTHAM FIRST NATIONAL BANK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dopey PRIES open an access panel-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do they call him the Joker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard he wears make-up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make-up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dopey pulls out thick bundles of blue CAT 5 cables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  To scare people.  War paint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grumpy, Chuckles and Bozo get out of the car and march in the bank CARRYING ASSAULT RIFLES--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Security Guard looks up- Grumpy FIRES into the ceilin Customers SCREAM.  Chuckles CRACKS the Security Guard. As Grumpy and Bozo round up the hostages, one of the TELL presses a button mounted beneath her window- a SILENT ALA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dopey watches the alarm PING his handheld.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here comes the silent alarm. (touches a button) And there it goes.  That's funny.   It didn't dial out to 911- it was  trying to reach a private number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, Happy RAISES his silenced HANDGUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it a problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no.  I'm done here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy SHOOTS.  Dopey SLUMPS.  Happy picks up his bag and  FORCES OPEN the roof access door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and speeds down the stairs, to the basement.  He SLAMS open the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and comes face to face with a huge VAULT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo and Grumpy move down the line of hostages- Bozo hand each Hostage OBJECTS from a bag.  A GRENADE.  Grumpy foll PULLING THE PINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obviously, we don't want you doing  anything with your hands other than  holding on for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM.  Chuckles is BLOWN OFF HIS FEET- Grumpy and Bozo DI for cover- the Bank Manager steps out of his office, SHOT in hand.  Hostages SCRAMBLE, CLINGING their grenades...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy CLAMPS a DRILL to the vault- the bit SPINS- SLIDES  into the metal door- a BOLT of ELECTRICITY RIPS THROUGH T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grumpy and Bozo cower as the Bank Manager FIRES again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got three left?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo raises TWO fingers.  Grumpy squeezes off a SHOT.  Th Bank Manager FIRES.  FIRES again.  Grumpy looks at Bozo, nods.  Grumpy JUMPS UP. The Bank Manager FIRES- Grumpy GRUNTS as buckshot CLIPS h shoulder.  FALLS.  The Bank Manager moves in for the kill FUMBLING for new shells.  Bozo STANDS- SHOOTS him. Bozo picks up the shotgun.  Grumpy checks his wound- it's superficial.  He struggles to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you learn to count?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo's mask stares him down.  Grumpy heads for the stairs the back.  Bozo starts loading fresh shells into the shot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have any idea who you're stealing  from?  You and your friends are dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo looks down at him.  Says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy at the vault door, barefoot, turning the tumblers w hands stuffed into his SNEAKERS.  Grumpy walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They wired this thing up with 5,000  volts.  What kind of bank does that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mob bank.  Guess the Joker's as  crazy as they say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy shrugs.  Grips the WHEEL BOLT and SPINS it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the alarm guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss told me when the guy was done I  should take him out.  One less share.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny, he told me something similar...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy FREEZES.  The wheel SPINS to a STOP- the vault DOOR CLUNKS OPEN- Happy GRABS for his weapon- SPINS to see Gru SHOOT.  Grumpy steps over Happy into the vault...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...which is filled with an eight-foot MOUNTAIN OF CASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grumpy walks into the lobby, straining under several DUFF filled with cash.  He DUMPS them.  Looks at Bozo.  LAUGHS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, there's a lot to carry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo walks back into the lobby with two more DUFFELS.  Se them down on an ENORMOUS PILE.  Grumpy looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this guy was so smart he would  have had us bring a bigger car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grumpy JABS his pistol in Bozo's back.  Takes his weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm betting the Joker told you to  kill me soon as we loaded the cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes head) No.  I kill the bus driver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bus driver?  What bus-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo steps backwards.  SMASH.  Hostages SCREAM as the TAI END OF A YELLOW SCHOOL BUS ROCKETS through the front of t bank, SLAMMING Grumpy into the teller's window. Bozo picks up Grumpy's weapon.  Another clown OPENS the r door of the bus.  Bozo SHOOTS him.  Then loads the bags o the bus.  The wounded Bank Manager watches him.  In the  distance: SIRENS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think you're smart, huh?  Well, the  guy who hired you's just do the same  to you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo slowly shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure he will.  Criminals in this  town used to believe in things...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo turns back to the Bank Manager.  Crouches over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honor.  Respect.  What do you believe,  huh?  What do you bel-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo slides a GRENADE into the man's mouth.  A PURPLE THR is knotted around the pin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe that what doesn't kill  you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bozo PULLS off his MASK.  The Bank Manager GASPS.  In the reflections of the glass DEBRIS behind the Bank Manager w see GLIMPSES of a SCARRED MOUTH and CLOWN MAKEUP.  THE JO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...simply makes you stranger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bank Manager's eyes go wide.  The Joker rises, stroll towards the bus, the purple thread attached to the grenad pin UNRAVELING FROM THE PURPLE LINING of his jacket as he walks.  The Joker climbs into the bus, SHUTS the rear doo TRAPPING THE PURPLE THREAD...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids pour out, heading onto a long line of school buses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the bus pulls out, the purple thread PULLS THE PIN--  hostages scream and scurry away from the Bank Manager, wh shakes with fear as, with a FIZZ, the grenade does not  explode, but SPEWS RED SMOKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The School Bus pulls free of the Bank wall and pulls out  onto the street, SLIDING INTO THE LINE OF IDENTICAL BUSES HEADING PAST THE BANK.  The buses trundle past COP CARS r up the street... and we-

dialogues.speaker: GOTHAM
dialogues.text: From the top of a brick building a SHAFT OF LIGHT comes o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PATROLMAN looks up at the BAT-SIGNAL.  Smiles.  A DEALE standing beside a car spots the signal.  Steps back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, man.  I don't like it tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you, superstitious?  You got  more chance of winning the powerball  than running into him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DETECTIVE RAMIREZ, female, rookie detective, 30's, makes  coffee, watching a news show on the television. ON SCREEN: The host, MIKE ENGEL, lays into the MAYOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr Mayor, you were elected on a  campaign to clean up the city...  when are you going to start?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Mike-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like this so-called Batman- a lot of  people say he's doing some good that  criminals are running scared...  but  I say NO.  What kind of hero needs  to wear a mask?  You don't let  vigilantes run around breaking the  law... where does it end?   Yet, we  hear rumors that instead of trying  to arrest him the cops are using him  to do their dirty work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm told our men in the Major Crimes  Unit are close to an arrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Wuertz- the Mayor says you're  closing in on the Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WUERTZ looks up, listless.  Crumples up a paper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The investigation is ongoing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws the paper at the trash.  It rebounds off a boar headed 'BATMAN: SUSPECTS.' Lined with pictures: Abraham  Lincoln.  Elvis.  The Abominable Snowman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez comes out onto the roof.  LIEUTENANT GORDON sits a SEARCHLIGHT.  She hands Gordon a cup of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever intending to see your wife again,  Lieutenant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you had to go look after  your mother, detective.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They checked her back into hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (making light) Least there she's got someone round  the clock.  Unlike your wife. (looks at bat-signal) He hasn't shown?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon gets up.  Looks into the sky at the bat-signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Often doesn't.  But I like reminding  everybody that he's out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why wouldn't he come?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hopefully... Because he's busy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two black SUV's pull onto the top floor.  A large man eme the CHECHEN.  A BODYGUARD points at the sky.  The Chechen peers up at the BAT-SIGNAL.  Shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why we bring dogs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BODYGUARD 2 opens the back door- three enormous ROTWEILER emerge, GROWLING.  The Chechen crouches, KISSING the dogs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My little princes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to bodyguards) The Batman's invisible to you fools...  but my little princes...  they can  find human meat in complete darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen moves to the second SUV, reaches in and DRAGS out a skinny, wild-eyed JUNKIE by his hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (babbling) No!  No get 'em off me!  Off me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen drags the Junkie towards a battered white van The van's REAR DOORS OPEN... two armed THUGS emerge, carr BARRELS... a third hovers in the dark interior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!  Look what your drugs did to  my customers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buyer beware...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The figure emerges: SCARECROW.  Wearing his mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told your man my compound would  take you places.  I never said they'd  be places you wanted to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My business is repeat customers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you don't like what I have to  offer, buy from someone else.   Assuming Batman left anyone else to  buy from.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen frowns.  THE DOGS START BARKING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervous) He's here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BURLY THUG at the periphery is suddenly SUCKED into the darkness.  In his place a shadow straightens, revealing  POINTED BAT-EARS against the glittering skyline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, sonofbitch- my dogs are  hungry, pity there's only one of  you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BODYGUARD to the side DISAPPEARS with a scream, and a S BAT-SHADOW appears. The Chechen looks taken aback.  Three more BAT-SHADOWS  appear... even the dogs stop growling. BOOM!  A hole appears in the SUV next to the Chechen.  Th first bat-shadow steps into the light carrying a SHOTGUN. CHAOS as men scatter and the rooftop erupts in GUNFIRE. Chechen TURNS as he hears one of his men SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loose the dogs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Bodyguard releases the DOGS- they RACE, SALIVATING, int the darkness... The Dogs RACE towards a Bat-Shadow- the first dog LEAPS,  gets its JAWS around the Bat-Shadow's throat... Scarecrow ducks behind the van- holes PUNCHED in the side shotgun blasts right behind him.  He starts to climb into the driver's seat- The muzzle of a shotgun is pressed to the back of his hea a bat-shadow is behind him- he SPRAYS him with FEAR TOXIN the bat-shadow collapses to the ground, SCREAMING.  The  Chechen, cowering from gunfire, looks down at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the real thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're old friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HUGE BLACK SHAPE SLAMS down onto a row of parked cars. The BATMOBILE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's more like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen's men BLAST away at the front of the car: the bullets SPARK off its monstrous surface harmlessly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockpit is EMPTY.  One of the screens reads "LOITER". The shooting STOPS.  The screen switches to "INTIMIDATE"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men STARE at the Batmobile for a quiet moment... BOOM The Batmobile CANNONS blast cars all around the men-  A bat-shadow lines up his shotgun on a running bodyguard- CLUNK- a BLACK GAUNTLET grasps the barrel and BENDS it up with a HOWL of tortured steel- the bat-shadow looks into face of the Batman.  The REAL BATMAN. The Bat-shadow STUMBLES BACKWARDS in terror, leaving the  bent shotgun in Batman's hand.  Batman OPENS his hand,  revealing a PNEUMATIC MANGLE hidden in his palm- Batman bears down on the dogs mauling another bat-shadow- DRAWS his GRAPPLING GUN and SHOOTS his grapple into the f Batman's leg and RIPS him from the dogs, one dog HANGING as Batman pulls the unconscious man away... the Chechen R down the ramp towards the exit... As Batman KICKS the dog off the fake Batman- the Chechen  gets into his SUV- another dog LOCKS ITS JAWS around Batm forearm, RIPPING, TEARING- Batman SWINGS THE DOG OVER HIS HEAD- SMASHES it against the ground- its jaws OPEN... Batman rises, an engine RACES behind him- he can't turn i time- BLAM- he's SLAMMED sideways by the speeding van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scarecrow, driving, NODS at him and hits the gas... Batma raises his hand, revealing his jointed mangle and pistons The mangle STRAIGHTENS and ROTATES from his palm to the k edge of his opened hand... Batman CHOPS straight through the windshield- pulls his h out and CHOPS again- the mangle gets STUCK- Scarecrow ste towards a column...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman can't free himself- he turns a dial on his forearm piston- EXPLOSIVE BOLTS blow, freeing his gauntlet from t mangle- he ROLLS free of the van as it SCRAPES the column and barrels down the circular exit ramp. Batman rises.  A phony batman lying on the ground watches Batman climbs up to the edge of the ten-story corkscrew r and stands there, waiting for something. After a moment he JUMPS... and falls... ten stories... He's about to hit the exit ramp- the van appears- his cap POPS OPEN- he SLAMS into the roof, CRUSHING the cab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen's men are lined up against the wall, bound wi zip-ties.  So are the fake batmen.  Batman DUMPS Scarecro next to the three "Batmen", RIPS his mask off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're trying to help you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't need help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not my diagnosis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman silences Scarecrow with his boot.  Turns to "Batma

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let me find you out here again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman moves towards the Batmobile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need us!  There's only one of  you-it's war out here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman gets into the Batmobile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What gives you the right?!  What's  the difference between you and me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Canopy hisses shut-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not wearing hockey pads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "Batman" looks down at his makeshift costume as the  Batmobile ROARS past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIEUTENANT GORDON ducks the barrage of SHOUTED QUESTIONS  from press and picks his way into the lobby of the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FORENSIC SPECIALISTS work the room.  Ramirez hands Gordon PRINTS- indicates the surveillance cameras.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't resist showing us his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks at the grainy blow-up of THE JOKER'S FACE:  sweating clown makeup plastered thick around the mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put this out, by morning we can put  a big top over central holding and  sell tickets.  What's he hiding under  that makeup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon approaches a FORENSIC PHOTOGRAPHER shooting Grumpy body.  Gordon crouches to look at his clown mask.  Batman steps from the shadows.  Gordon nods at Ramirez.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give us a minute, please, people!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Forensic team and Ramirez leave.  Gordon hands Batman the blow-up of the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Him again.  Who are the others?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another bunch of small timers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman pulls a DEVICE from his belt- moves to the bundles cash scattered near the clown's body.  The device PINGS. Batman picks up a BUNDLE.  Hands it to Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of the marked bills I gave you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My detectives have been making drug  buys with them for weeks.  This bank  was another drop for the mob.  That  makes five banks- we've found the  bulk of their dirty cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon waves the photo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about this Joker guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One man or the entire mob?  He can  wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll have to hit all banks  simultaneously.  SWAT teams, backup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon holds up the bundle of banknotes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the new D.A. gets wind of this,  he'll want in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you trust him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be hard to keep him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon bags the cash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hear he's as stubborn as you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Batman is already gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred walks past soaring downtown views as he carries a  breakfast tray through the vast, empty penthouse.  He sto looking at a still-made bed.  Alfred sighs, turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred gets out of the Rolls carrying a thermos.  He walk towards a RAILWAY BRIDGE, stops at a FREIGHT CONTAINER  sitting, lopsided, on blocks.  Alfred unlocks the RUSTY  PADLOCK AND CHAIN.  Steps inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred FUMBLES in the dark- bangs his elbow- A HISS as th FLOOR LOWERS... Alfred sinks down into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The container floor lowers on a giant PISTON.  Alfred ste off into a large, LOW-CEILINGED CONCRETE CHAMBER.  The  Batmobile sits in the middle.  Machines- 3D printers, pow tools- dot the high-tech space.  At one end, Wayne sits a bank of monitors watching CCTV footage of the bank robber

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be nice when Wayne Manor's rebuilt  and you can swap not sleeping in a  penthouse for not sleeping in a  mansion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred places a cup of coffee in front of Wayne, who is  STITCHING up a cut on his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (takes needle) When you stitch yourself up you make  a bloody mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I learn from my mistakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ought to be pretty knowledgeable  by now, then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My armor... I'm carrying too much  weight- I need to be faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure Mr. Fox can oblige. (looks at wound) Did you get mauled by a tiger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dog. (off look) A big dog.  There were more copycats  last night, Alfred.  With guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you could hire some of them  and take weekends off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This wasn't exactly what I had in  mind when I said I wanted to inspire  people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.  But things are improving.   Look at the new District Attorney...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne indicates a monitor: a handsome MAN in a suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am.  Closely.  I need to know if  he can be trusted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred looks at other images- the D.A. at a meeting.   Campaigning.  Helping someone out of a cab: RACHEL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you interested in his character...  or his social circle?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who Rachel spends her time with is  her business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I trust you're not following  me on my day off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you ever took one, I might.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred bites the thread.  Examines his stitches.  Looks a the SCARS criss-crossing Wayne's shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know your limits, Master Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman has no limits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you do, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't afford to know them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what happens the day you find  out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all know how much you like to say  'I told you so'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That day, Master Wayne, even I won't  want to.  Probably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARVEY DENT bursts into the courtroom.  Assistant D.A. RA DAWES, look up, ANNOYED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry I'm late, folks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel leans in to Dent, speaking under her breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where were you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Worried you'd have to step up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know the briefs backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent pulls a large silver dollar out of his pocket.  Grin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, then, fair's fair: heads, I'll  take it.  Tails, he's all yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent FLIPS.  Shows it to Rachel- heads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're flipping coins to see who  leads?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My father's lucky coin.  As I recall,  it got me my first date with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm serious, Harvey, you don't leave  things like this to chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't. (sincere) I make my own luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks across at the defendant- SAL MARONI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought the DA just played golf  with the Mayor, things like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tee-off's 1:30.  More than enough  time to put you away for life, Sally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BAILIFFS lead a THIN MAN into the witness box.  ROSSI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rossi takes a SIP of water.  Dent works the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Carmine Falcone in Arkham,  someone must've stepped up to run  the so-called family. (Rossi nods) Is this man in the courtroom today? (Rossi nods again) Could you identify him for us, please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns to Maroni, who is poker-faced.  Dent smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You win, counselor.  It was me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's smile disappears.  He turns back to Rossi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a sworn statement from you  that this man, Salvatore Maroni, is  the new head of the Falcone crime  family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni?  He's a fall guy.  I'm the  brains of the organization.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAUGHS from the gallery.  Dent turns to the JUDGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Permission to treat the witness as  hostile?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hostile?  I'll show you hostile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rossi JUMPS UP, points a GUN at Dent's face.  SCREAMS fro the gallery.  Rossi PULLS the TRIGGER- the gun MISFIRES w a POP.  Dent steps forward, grabs the GUN- DECKS Rossi wi a RIGHT CROSS- unloads the GUN and sets it down in front Maroni.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ceramic 28 caliber.  Made in China.   If you want to kill a public servant,  Mr. Maroni, I recommend you buy  American.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone STARES, open-mouthed, as Dent adjusts his tie. Bailiffs are wrestling Rossi from the box-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, your honor, I'm not done...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, excited, leads Dent through the lobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll never link the gun to Maroni,  so we can't charge him, but I'll  tell you one thing- the fact they  tried to kill you means we're getting  to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glad you're so pleased, Rachel.  I'm  fine by the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel turns to Dent.  Smooths his lapels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey, you're Gotham's D.A.- if  you're not getting shot at, you're  not doing your job. (smiles) 'Course if you said you were rattled  we could take the rest of the day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't.  I dragged the head of the  Major Crimes Unit down here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim Gordon?  He's a friend- try to  be nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stands as Dent enters.  The two men shake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Word is you've got a hell of a right  cross.  Shame Sal's going to walk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, good thing about the mob is  they keep giving you second chances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent picks up a bundle of bills from the heist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lightly irradiated bills.  Fancy  stuff for a city cop.  Have help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We liaise with various agencies-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save it, Gordon.  I want to meet  him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Official policy is to arrest the  vigilante known as Batman on sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that flood light on top of M.C.U.?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you have any concerns about...   malfunctioning equipment... take  them up with maintenance, counselor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent tosses the bills back onto his desk.  Annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've put every known money launderer  in Gotham behind bars.  But the mob  is still getting its money out.  I  think you and your "friend" have  found the last game in town and you're  trying to hit 'em where it hurts:  their wallets.  Bold.  You gonna  count me in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In this town, the fewer people know  something, the safer the operation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, I don't like that you've got  your own special unit, and I don't  like that it's full of cops I  investigated at internal affairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I didn't work with cops you'd  investigated while you were making  your name at I.A.- I'd be working  alone.  I don't get political points  for being an idealist- I have to do  the best I can with what I have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks at Gordon.  Considering how to proceed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to back warrants for  search and seizure on five banks  without telling me who we're after?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can give you the names of the banks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that's a start.  I'll get you  your warrants.  But I want your trust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rises) You don't have to sell me, Dent.  We  all know you're Gotham's white knight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grins) I hear they've got a different  nickname for me down at M.C.U..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LUCIUS FOX, CEO of Wayne Enterprises, and the board liste to LAU, 40s, CEO of L.S.I. Holdings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In China L.S.I. Holdings stands for  dynamic new growth.  A joint Chinese  venture with Wayne Enterprises will  be a powerhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Mr. Lau, I speak for the rest  of the board, and Mr. Wayne, in  expressing our own excitement...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chinese look to the head of the table: Wayne, ASLEEP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox shows Lau to the elevator.  He's joined by, REESE, 30 an ambitious M and A consultant lawyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK, Mr. Fox.  Everyone knows  who really runs Wayne Enterprises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be in touch as soon as our  people have wrapped up the diligence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator doors close.  Reese frowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I know Mr. Wayne's curious how  his trust fund gets replenished but  frankly... it's embarrassing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox heads for his office, Reese in tow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You worry about the diligence, Mr.  Reese.  I'll worry about Bruce Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's done- the numbers are solid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Do it again.  Wouldn't want the trust  fund to run out, would we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne is standing by the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another long night? (Wayne smiles) This joint venture was your idea,  and the consultants love it, but I'm  not convinced.  L.S.I.'s grown 8  percent annually, like clockwork.   They must have a revenue stream that's  off the books.  Maybe even illegal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK.  Cancel the deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks at Wayne) You already knew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I needed a closer look at their books.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox looks at Wayne.  Wry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything else you can trouble me  for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a new suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks him over) Three buttons is a little nineties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not talking about fashion, Mr.Fox,  so much as function.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne pulls some diagrams.  Fox looks them over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to be able to turn your  head?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure make backing out of the driveway  easier.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll see what I can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel and Dent at a table.  Dent looks a little intimida by the surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It took three weeks to get a  reservation and I had to tell them I  worked for the government.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This city health inspector's not  afraid to pull strings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel smiles.  Then, over Dent's shoulder, she sees Wayn enter, accompanied by a beautiful woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel!  Fancy that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Bruce.  Fancy that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, Natascha.  Natascha, Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Russian accent) Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The famous Bruce Wayne.  Rachel's  told me everything about you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I certainly hope not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce, this is Harvey Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's put a couple tables together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if they'll let us-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They should!  I own the place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For how long?  About three weeks?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Natascha, aren't you...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prima ballerina for the Moscow Ballet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey's taking me next week.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're into ballet, Harvey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  He knows I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An extra table arrives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They finish up dinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, come on- how could you want to  raise children in a city like this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was raised here.  I turned out OK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is Wayne Manor in the city limits?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel gives Dent a withering look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Palisades?  Sure.  You know, as  our new D.A. you might want to figure  out where your jurisdiction ends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm talking about the kind of city  that idolizes a masked vigilante...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham's proud of an ordinary man  standing up for what's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham needs heroes like you- elected  officials, not a man who thinks he's  above the law.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly.  Who appointed the Batman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We did.  All of us who stood by and  let scum take control of our city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne watches Dent.  Sees his passion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But this is a democracy, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When their enemies were at the gate,  the Romans would suspend democracy  and appoint one man to protect the  city.  It wasn't considered an honor.   It was considered public service.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the last man they asked to protect  the republic was named Caesar.  He  never gave up that power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I guess you either die a hero  or you live long enough to see  yourself become the villain.  Look,  whoever the Batman is, he doesn't  want to spend the rest of his life  doing this.  How could he?  Batman's  looking for someone to take up his  mantle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone like you, Mr. Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.  If I'm up to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Natascha reaches up and covers the top half of Dent's fac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what if Harvey Dent is the caped  crusader?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I were sneaking out every night  someone would've noticed by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent takes Rachel's hand.  Rachel glances at Wayne.  Awkw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you've sold me, Dent.  I'm  gonna throw you a fundraiser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's nice of you, Bruce, but I'm  not up for reelection for three years.   That stuff won't start for-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think you understand.  One  fundraiser with my pals, you'll never  need another cent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A line of high-end AUTOS dispenses well dressed GANGSTERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen walks through a METAL DETECTOR manned by two  CHINESE.  A lean, African-American man, 50's, is being wa This is GAMBOL.  He nods at the Chechen, wary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham's most notorious GANGSTERS.  A door opens, and two BURLY CHINESE enter, carrying a TV.  They set it down on end of the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hell is this...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The screen flickers to life: Lau.  The room ERUPTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, please.  As you're all  aware, one of our deposits was stolen.   A relatively small amount: 68 million.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's stupid enough steal from us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm told the man who arranged the  heist calls himself Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two-bit whack-job wears a cheap purple  suit and make-up.  He's not the  problem- he's a nobody. (looks at Lau) The problem is our money being tracked  by the cops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Murmurs of surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks to Mr. Maroni's well-placed  sources we know that police have  indeed identified our banks using  marked bills and are planning to  seize your funds today-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone starts SHOUTING at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon sits in a SWAT van outside a bank.  Stephens is ou another.  Ramirez a third... SWAT teams CHECK WEAPONS and prepare move...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau waits for the noise to subside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You promised safe, clean money launder-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the investigation ongoing, none  of you can risk hanging on to your  own proceeds.  And since the  enthusiastic new D.A. has put all my  competitors out of business, I'm  your only option.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what are you proposing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving all deposits to one secure  location.  Not a bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where, then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obviously, no one can know but me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If the police were to gain leverage  over one of you everyone's money  would be at stake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What stops them getting to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the money is moved I go to Hong  Kong.  Far from Dent's jurisdiction.  And the Chinese will not extradite  one of their own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the back of the room comes LAUGHTER.  It grows and g until it fills the room.  All eyes turn: The Joker.  Sweaty clown makeup obscuring the AWFUL SCARS which widen his mouth into a PERMANENT, GHOULISH SMILE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought I told bad jokes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me one reason I shouldn't have  my boy here pull your head off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker pulls out a freshly sharpened pencil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about a magic trick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker SLAMS the pencil into the table, leaving it UPR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make this pencil disappear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol nods.  His BODYGUARD MOVES at the Joker- who SIDES GRIPS his head- SLAMS it, FACE DOWN, onto the table... The Bodyguard goes LIMP and slides off of the table.  The PENCIL is gone.  MAGIC.  The Joker BOWS.  Grins at Gambol

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And by the way, the suit wasn't cheap.   You should know.  You bought it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol STANDS, furious.  The Chechen stops him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit.  I wanna hear proposition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker nods his thanks.  Rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A year ago these cops and lawyers  wouldn't dare cross any of you.   What happened?  Did your balls drop  off?  See, a guy like me-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A freak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughs.  Which the Joker tries to ignore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A guy like me... I know why you're  holding your little group therapy  session in broad daylight.  I know  why you're afraid to go out at night.   Batman.  He's shown Gotham your true  colors.  And Dent's just the  beginning. (indicates Lau) And as for his so-called plan- Batman  has no jurisdiction.  He'll find him  and make him squeal. (smiles at Lau) I can tell the squealers every time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you propose?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's simple.  Kill the Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jeers.  Laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's so easy why haven't you done  it already?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like my mother used to tell me- if  you're good at something, never do  it for free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughter.  The Joker shrugs.  Rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't deal with this now, soon  Gambol won't even be able to get a  nickel for his grandma-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enough from the clown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol gets up, MOVING at the Joker, who casually opens h coat, revealing EXPLOSIVES wired to his chest.  Gambol st

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's not blow this out of all  proportion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol stares at the Joker.  Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you can steal from us and  just walk away?  I'm putting the  word out- 5 hundred grand for this  clown dead.  A million alive, so I  get to teach him some manners, first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker shrugs.  Turns to the assembled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me know when you change your  minds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker strolls out.  Maroni turns to Lau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How soon can you move the money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon hurries up the steps to a bank.  SWAT teams rush t various banks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I already have...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CHINESE MAN finishes loading a TRACTOR TRAILER with cas boxes.  The truck pulls out into a CONVOY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stands in an almost empty bank vault.  Furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For obvious reasons I couldn't wait  for your permission...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shot of Lau on the TV widens...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest assured, your money is safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is already on his private jet. IN THE SKY: THE BAT SIGNAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman emerges from the shadows.  The man next to the glo spotlight turns: DENT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a hard man to reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon BURSTS onto the rooftop, weapon drawn.  Sees Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau's halfway to Hong Kong- if you'd  asked, I could have taken his passport-  I told you to keep me in the loop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?  All that was left in the vaults  were the marked bills- they knew we  were coming!  As soon as your office  got involved, there's a leak-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My office?!  You're sitting down  here with scum like Wuertz and  Ramirez... (off look) Oh, yeah, Gordon- I almost had your  rookie cold on a racketeering beef.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't try to cloud the fact that  clearly Maroni's got people in your  office, Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns to Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need Lau back, but the Chinese  won't extradite a national under any  circumstances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I get him to you, can you get him  to talk?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get him to sing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going after the mob's life  savings.  Things will get ugly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew the risks when I took this  job, lieutenant.  Same as you. (turns to Batman) How will you get him back, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman is gone.  Dent looks around, startled.  Gordon smi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He does that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox gets up from behind his desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our Chinese friend left town before  I could tell him the deal is off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure you've always wanted to go  to Hong Kong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox opens the door to a private elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox turns a key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with a phone call?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think Mr. Lau deserves a more  personal touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox leads Wayne off the elevator and into the vast space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For high altitude jumps, you need  oxygen and stabilizers.  I must say-  compared to your usual requests,  jumping out of an airplane is pretty  straightforward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius stops at a cabinet, pulls open a drawer and hauls an oxygen tank and ribbed rubber hosing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about getting back into the plane?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can recommend a good travel agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without it landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's more like it, Mr. Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shuts the drawer.  Moves off, thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think I have anything here. The CIA had a program in the '60s  for getting their people out of hot  spots.  Called Sky Hook.  Now-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox opens a cabinet to reveal COMPONENTS OF A NEW BAT-SUI ARMORED PLATING secured to mesh.  Wayne lifts an arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hardened kevlar plates on a titanium- dipped fiber tri-weave for  flexibility...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne examines DOUBLE BLADE SCALLOPS on the gauntlet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be lighter, faster, more  agile...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne flinches as the BLADES FIRE, SPINNING LIKE THROWING STARS, NARROWLY MISSING his ear, embedding themselves in filing cabinet.  Fox looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you should read the  instructions, first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox picks up the chest, demonstrating its flexibility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, there's a trade-off... the spread  of the plates gives you weak spots.   You'll be more vulnerable to gunfire  and knives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We wouldn't want things getting too  easy, would we? (picks up suit) How will it hold up against dogs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox looks at him quizzically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You talking chihuahuas or rotweilers? (Wayne smiles) It should do fine against cats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne examines a parachute harness.  Alfred unfolds a dia of a NAVY CARGO PLANE with a giant "V" mounted on the fro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found one.  In Arizona.  Very nice  man says it will take him a week to  get it running.  And he takes cash.   What about a flight crew?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: South Korean smugglers.  They run  flights into Pyongyang, below radar  the whole way.  Did you think of an  alibi?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred looks quite pleased with himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel and Dent arrive to find the box office SHUTTERED. sign:'PERFORMANCE CANCELED.' A newspaper story is taped t the glass.  Over a picture of BRUCE WAYNE ON A YACHT: LOVE BOAT- Billionaire absconds with entire Moscow ballet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred, picks his way over twelve SUNBATHING BALLERINAS. Wayne looks up from a newspaper.  Alfred points to a SEAP gently touching down across the bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe your plane is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look tired, Alfred.  Will you be  all right without me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Ballerina rolls over- waves the suntan lotion at Alfred

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you can tell me the Russian for  'apply your own bloody suntan lotion.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne tosses a large, waterproof kit bag into the water a JUMPS in after it.  Begins swimming over to the sea-plane

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol racks up.  A bodyguard steps into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody here for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gambol looks to the back- three rough customers are waiti

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They say they've killed the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've come for the reward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They bring proof?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They say they've brought the body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bodyguards FLOP a BODY wrapped in garbage bags onto t table.  The BOUNTY HUNTERS wait in the corner.  Gambol pu back one of the garbage bags, revealing the Joker's blood face.  Gambol spits.  Turns to face the bounty hunters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So.  Dead you get five hundred-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind Gambol, the Joker SITS UP- THRUSTS knives into the bodyguards' chests.  Gambol spins to see a crazy grin on Joker's spit-dribbled face-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker gets a switchblade in Gambol's mouth- SHARP MET PULLING THE CHEEK TAUT.  The Bounty Hunters subdue the  remaining bodyguards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna know how I got these scars?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My father was a drinker and a fiend.   He'd beat mommy right in front of  me.  One night he goes off crazier  than usual, mommy gets the kitchen  knife to defend herself.  He doesn't  like that.  Not.  One.  Bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker TUGS Gambols cheek with the blade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, me watching, he takes the knife  to her, laughing while he does it.   Turns to me and says 'why so serious?'   Comes at me with the knife- 'why so  serious?'  Sticks the blade in my  mouth- 'Let's put a smile on that  face' and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks up at the ASHEN FACES of the remaining Bo Guards.  Smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why so serious?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker FLICKS his wrist- the Body Guards flinch as Gam goes down.  The Joker turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, our organization is small, but  we've got a lot of potential for  aggressive expansion... so which of  you fine gentlemen would like to  join our team?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three bodyguards all nod.  The Joker SNAPS a pool cue

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only one slot open right now- so  we're going to have try-outs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker drops the broken cue in the middle of the men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make it fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men stare at each other.  Then at the jagged pool cue

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HELICOPTER touches down on one of the hotel's twin heli Two L.S.I. VPs approach, heads ducked.  Fox gets out- the shake hands, shouting over the engine-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to Hong Kong, Mr. Fox!  Mr.  Lau regrets he is unable to meet you  in person.  But with his current  legal difficulties...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The VPs usher Fox towards security.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid for security reasons I  have to ask for your mobile phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius hands his phone to a SECURITY GUARD, who puts the  phone in a box underneath his station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox and Lau eat lunch in a dining room overlooking the ci

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must apologize for leaving Gotham  in the middle of our negotiations.   This misunderstanding with the Gotham  police force... I couldn't let such  a thing threaten my company.  A  businessman of your stature will  understand.  But with you here... we  can continue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it was good of you to bring me  out here in such style, Mr. Lau.   But I've actually come...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CELL PHONE rings.  Fox pulls out a second, identical, p Fox presses the off switch and places the phone by his pl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We do not allow cell phones in-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.  Forgot I had it.  So, I've  come to explain why we're going to  have to put our deal on hold...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau stares at Fox.  Clearly furious.  Fox smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't afford to be seen to do  business with... well, whatever it  is you're accused of being.  A  businessman of your stature will  understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau gets up.  Silent.  Fox retrieves his phone.  Stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cold) I think, Mr. Fox, that a simple phone  call might have sufficed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I do love Chinese food.  And  Mr. Wayne didn't want you to think  we'd been deliberately wasting your  time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just accidentally wasting it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) That's very good- "accidentally."   Very good.  I'll be sure and tell  Mr. Wayne that he was wrong about  you not having a sense of humor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius walks back through security.  Nods at the VP, who  bows, offering Lucius his cell phone.  Lucius shakes his  head, holds up the IDENTICAL PHONE.  The VP smiles, nods, puts the phone back into the tray with several others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two SMUGGLERS steal glances at Wayne, crouched at the rea in balaclava and flight suit.  The COPILOT signals Wayne, who pulls on his oxygen mask and stands up.  The rear of plane OPENS.  Wayne steps to the edge, then JUMPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving across the water towards Hong Kong harbor...tiny f DROPS into frame, PLUMMETING towards the water- SPEEDING past the highest floors of skyscrapers, seconds  from impact.  Wayne PULLS the chute- DROPS into the water

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne pulls himself out of the water, dragging up his pac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne stops halfway up the crowded commuter escalator.  H takes a camera and lines up a shot like any tourist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a better view from the peak  tram.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne turns to find Fox standing there, street map out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's the view from L.S.I. Holdings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Restricted.  Lau's holed up in there  good and tight.  Here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox shows Wayne the phone.  The display: a 3-D map of Lau office suite.  Wayne takes the phone, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had R and D work it up- it sends  out high frequencies and records the  response time to map an environment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Sonar.  Just like a b-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Submarine.  Like a submarine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the other device?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne nods, moves away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Wayne? (Wayne turns) Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving towards the tallest building in the glittering sky to find Wayne, crouched on the roof.  The blades of his  gauntlets CLICK into place.  He dons the helmet-like cowl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His "cape" is in the form of a hard faceted PACK. He stands- pulls two black boxes from his belt, CLICKS th together and UNFOLDS them into a RIFLE-LIKE DEVICE.  Batm SCOPES a second, lower building.  Adjust a setting and FI four times... Four small STICKY BOMBS SLAP onto the glass of the lower  building.  They have visible timers which are COUNTING DO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius' cell phone GLOWS in the box under the Security Gu desk.  CHARACTERS race across the screen. Then the monitor FLICKERS off, the lights DIM and all of security doors in the front of the building OPEN at once. The Guard grabs his radio- CALLS FOR HELP...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman LAUNCHES into the glittering night, DROPPING from tall tower... his pack BURSTS OPEN, becoming his BAT WING he GLIDES down to the lower building, STREAKING around it BANKING HARD to line up with a window in the rear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau is talking on the phone, staring at a profit projecti on a flat screen monitor.  Suddenly the room goes dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Batman HURTLES towards the glass he COLLAPSES his wing WRAPPING his cape around himself and CANNONBALLING THROUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROLLING across the floor in a flurry of broken glass...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau pulls out a HANDGUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau steps into the hallway.  His BODYGUARDS are waiting f him, carrying FLASHLIGHTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell are the cops?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell am I paying them for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They head for the stairwell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small ARMY of Hong Kong police lead by a HONG KONG DETE descends on the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau and his men make their way out onto the mezzanine. Across the room, something makes a CRASHING SOUND.  Lau's men fan out, trying to cover the room with their flashlig Suddenly, one of the flashlights goes DARK.  Then another Someone SCREAMS. Lau FIRES.  Then FIRES again.  The muzzle flash from his  weapon STROBES the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops SWARM into the building.  A LOBBY SECURITY GUARD dir the Hong Kong Detective where to go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau LOCKS the door.  RELOADS.  The door is KICKED open. FIRES.  No one is there. Lau stares, finger restless on the trigger.  From his rig a NOISE.  He turns and FIRES. In the muzzle FLASH: Batman, bearing down on him like a d Lau FIRES, and FIRES again as Batman TACKLES him.  Batman pulls out a SMALL PACK- STRAPS it onto Lau- The COUNTER on the sticky bombs hits 0- The Hong Kong Detective and the Cops BURST into the room- the WALL AND CEILING BEHIND BATMAN AND LAU EXPLODES- reve the dawn sky above Hong Kong. The Detective looks around as he hears a LOW RUMBLE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman JERKS the RIPCORD on Lau's pack.  Cops cower as a  WEATHER BALLOON EXPLODES out of the pack, unreeling high- test nylon.  The Cops cock their weapons. Lau looks up.  Bemused.  The weather balloon is two hundr feet up, swaying gently.  The RUMBLE BUILDS... Suddenly, a MASSIVE C-130 ROARS over.  The large V on the front of the plane SNAGS the line- Lau and BATMAN are YAN

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE HOLE IN THE CEILING--
dialogues.text: Lau SCREAMS as he and Batman SOAR UP INTO THE DAWN SKY... The Detective looks up.  Batman and Lau are gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon is looking through case files.  Ramirez walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna want to see this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon follows Ramirez through a CROWD of excited cops. the ground, trussed like a chicken- Lau.  A sign taped to his chest: 'Please deliver to Lieutenant Gordon.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau sits next to his sleazy lawyer, EVANS.  Rachel walks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give us the money and we'll deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The money is the only reason I'm  still alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel leans forward, speaking softly.  Clearly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean when they hear that you've  helped us they're going to kill you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you threatening my client?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm just assuming your client's  cooperation with this investigation. As will everyone. (moves to the door) Enjoy your stay in County, Mr.Lau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. (Rachel stops) I won't give you the money, but I'll  give you my clients.  All of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were a glorified accountant-  what could you have on all of them  that we could charge?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm good with calculation- I handled  all their investments.  One big pot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent hits a buzzer.  Turns to Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got it.  RICO.  If their money  was pooled we can charge all of them  as one criminal conspiracy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charge them with what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a RICO case if we can charge any  of the conspirators with a felony-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can charge all of them with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent nods at Rachel, excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel comes back in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Lau, do you have details of this  communal fund?  Ledgers, notebooks...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) Immunity, protection and a chartered  plane back to Hong Kong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once you've testified in open court.   So with your clients locked up, what  happens to all that money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like I said- I'm good with  calculation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent and Gordon watch Lau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't go to County.  I'll keep  him here in the holding cells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this Gordon, your fortress?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You trust them over at County?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't trust them here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau stays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's your call, Lieutenant.  Be right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am, counselor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent stands in front of a small crowd of reporters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chinese government claim their  international rights have been broken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know about Mr. Lau's travel  arrangements...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's press conference plays on a TV in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grins) ...but I'm sure glad he's back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni and the Chechen are watching the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I put word out.  We hire the clown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (off look) He was right.  We have to fix real  problem.  Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni shakes his head.  Spots Gordon walking over dangli a pair of handcuffs.  Nods at the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our boy looks good on the tube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure you want to embarrass me in  front of my friends, Lieutenant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, they're coming, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon points out the window to a PRISON BUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prison buses in every neighborhood.  COPS load them with  CRIMINALS.  Stephens puts Crime Boss in a prison bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JUDGE SURRILLO reads the list of charges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...849 counts racketeering, 246 counts  fraud, 87 counts conspiracy murder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Judge Surrillo turns the page.  A PLAYING CARD sits there A Joker.  He glances at it, curious, puts it to one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...how do the defendants plead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ARMY of DEFENSE LAWYERS jostle YELLING ALL AT ONCE.  T STENOGRAPHER looks up, helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MAYOR, COMMISSIONER LOEB, and Gordon look up as Dent  enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DENT!  What was that circus?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I asked Gordon to make some arrests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks at report) Five hundred and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forty-nine, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon nods at Dent, approving.  Dent grins back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 549 criminals at once?!  How did you  convince Surrillo to hear this farce?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shares my enthusiasm for justice.   After all, she is a judge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even if you blow enough smoke to get  convictions out of Surrillo, you'll  set a new record at appeals for  quickest kick in the ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It won't matter.  The head guys make  bail, sure... but the mid-level guys,  they can't, and they can't afford to  be off the streets long enough for  trial and appeal.  They'll cut deals  that include some jail time.  Think  of all you could do with 18 months  of clean streets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mayor waves Gordon and Loeb out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The public likes you, Dent.  That's  the only reason this might fly.  But  that means it's on you.  They're all  coming after you, now.  Not just the  mob... politicians, journalists,  cops-anyone whose wallet's about to  get lighter.  Are you up to it? (Dent smiles) You better be.  They get anything on  you... those criminals will be back  on the streets...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mayor turns to look out of the window.  Quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Followed swiftly by you and me-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANG!  A DARK SHAPE CRACKS THE GLASS in front of the Mayo nose.  Dent rushes to the window, looks out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEDESTRIANS look up, someone SCREAMS, someone POINTS- fiv stories up... SWINGING from a FLAGPOLE... BATMAN.  HANGING BY HIS NECK.  DEAD.  His mouth roughly  painted in a DEMONIC CLOWN SMILE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Batman" is lowered from the flagpole.  The same fake Bat we saw earlier.  Pinned to his chest by a KNIFE, a PLAYIN CARD.  A Joker.  Gordon moves closer to the body.  The ca has writing on it: WILL THE REAL BATMAN PLEASE STAND UP?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne comes into the living room, excited.  Alfred is  supervising party arrangements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think your fundraiser will be a  great success, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And why do you think I wanted to  hold a party for Harvey Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I assumed it was your usual reason  for socialising beyond myself and  the scum of Gotham's underbelly: to  try and impress Miss Dawes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very droll.  But very wrong.  Actually  it's Dent.  You see-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne trails off as he spots something  on the television: the Batman HANGING  as from a NEWS CAMERA, framed by a  graphic that reads 'BATMAN DEAD?'  .  Image cuts to Engel in the studio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Police released video footage  found concealed on the body.   Sensitive viewers be aware: it is  disturbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The image cuts to a BLINDFOLDED MAN, wearing a makeshift  Batman costume- face bruised and bloody.  In some kind of bright, fluorescent-lit room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them your name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak) Brian Douglas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you the real Batman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you dress up like him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a symbol... that we don't have  to be afraid of scum like you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you do, Brian.  You really do.   You think the Batman's helped Gotham?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brian nods uncertainly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at me. (Brian looks down) LOOK AT ME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brian looks up- the camera swings into the face of the Jo in CHALK-WHITE makeup, RED SMEAR of lipstick on his SCARS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is how crazy Batman's made  Gotham.  You want order in Gotham?   Batman has to go.  So... (leans in) Batman must take off his mask, and  turn himself in.  Every day he  doesn't... people will die.  Starting  tonight.  I'm a man of my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tape cuts to STATIC. Wayne turns to Alfred.  Silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent and Rachel get off the lift.  Dent stands in awe of penthouse and its guests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I've seen it all: Harvey Dent,  scourge of the underworld, scared  stiff by the trust fund brigade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel spots someone and darts off-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little liquid courage, Mr. Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns to see Alfred with drinks on a silver tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.  Alfred, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel talks about you all the time.   You've known her her whole life?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles, surveys crowd) Any psychotic ex-boyfriends I should  be aware of?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you have no idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred leaves Dent standing there, puzzled.  The crowd RE as a LOUD ROAR drowns conversation... Dent looks out-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne's CHOPPER touches down.  He spills out with a clutc of SUPERMODELS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne and the supermodels come out of the helipad elevato

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, I'm late- glad you started  without me!  Where's Rachel?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel cringes slightly.  Wayne spots her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel Dawes- my oldest friend.   When she told me she was dating Harvey  Dent, I had one thing to say... the  guy from those god-awful campaign  commercials?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughter.  Dent shifts, embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: II Believe in Harvey Dent.' Nice  slogan, Harvey.  Certainly caught  Rachel's attention.  But then I  started paying attention to Harvey,  and all he's been doing as our new  D.A., and you know what?  I believe  in Harvey Dent.  On his watch, Gotham  can feel a little safer.  A little  more optimistic.  So get out your  checkbooks and let's make sure that  he stays right where all of Gotham  wants him... (raises his glass) All except Gotham's criminals, of  course.  To the face of Gotham's  bright future- Harvey Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent smiles accepting the toast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez catches up to Gordon, holding paperwork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That Joker card pinned to the body?   Forensics found three sets of D.N.A..
