dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any matches?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon STOPS.  Turns to face her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The D.N.A. belongs to Judge Surrillo,  Harvey Dent and Commissioner Loeb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's telling us who he's  targeting- get a unit to Surrillo's  house, tell Wuertz to find Dent- get  them both into protective custody.   Where's the Commissioner?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: City hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seal the building.  No one in or out  till I get there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne walks out to the edge of the balcony and looks over Gotham.  Hears someone behind him- Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey may not know you well enough  to understand when you're making fun  of him.  But I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) I meant every word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne moves closer to Rachel.  Takes her arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The day you once told me about, the  day when Gotham no longer needs  Batman.  It's coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at Wayne.  Conflicted.  He moves closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't ask me to wait for that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne takes Rachel's arms, looking at her, excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's happening now- Harvey is that  hero.  He locked up half the city's  criminals, and he did it without  wearing a mask.  Gotham needs a hero  with a face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can throw a party, Wayne, I'll  give you that.  Thanks again.  Mind  if I borrow Rachel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel glances back at Wayne as she moves to Dent.  Wayne watches them head inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two MEN in suits knock at a Brownstone.  The door is open by Judge Surrillo.  The two Men hold up BADGES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon enters through a tight police presence at the door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon enters to find Loeb, flanked by armed cops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, what are you playing at?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon checks the window.  Turns to his men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're secure.  I want a floor-by- floor search of the entire building. (turns to Loeb) I'm sorry, sir.  We believe the Joker  has made a threat against your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, you're unlikely to discover  this for yourself, so take my word-  the Police Commissioner earns a lot  of threats...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loeb pulls a bottle of whisky and a tumbler from a drawer

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I found the appropriate response to  these situations a long time ago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The second man is waiting by the Judge's car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon wants me to go right now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These are dangerous people, Judge.   Even we don't know where you're going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands Surrillo a sealed envelope.  Opens the car door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in, then open the envelope.   It'll tell you where you're headed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surrillo climbs in.  Watches them drive away.  She opens envelope- pulls out a sheet of paper.  One word on it: 'UP'. Surrillo's car EXPLODES, heaving the car upwards on a  FIREBALL. A PASSERBY is thrown to the ground.  After a moment, BURN DEBRIS flutters down on him.  PLAYING CARDS.  JOKERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loeb pours himself a glass of whisky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get to explain to my wife why  I'm late for dinner, Lieutenant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the Joker card had a trace of  your D.N.A. on it-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bang at the door.  Gordon pulls his weapon, then opens

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just the normal number of bad guys  in the building- and they're all  city employees.  Here's a list.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd they get my D.N.A.?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks at Stephens's list.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody with access to your house  or office must've lifted a tissue or  a glass...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, realizing, spins around-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Loeb is already CHOKING- he DROPS his tumbler onto th desk- the spilled whiskey is SMOKING, eating into the woo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get a medic!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loeb COLLAPSES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent pulls Rachel into the kitchen, away from the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot leave me on my own with  these people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole mob's after you and you're  worried about these guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Compared to this, the mob doesn't  scare me.  Although, I will say:  them gunning for you makes you see  things clearly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  It makes you think about what  you couldn't stand losing.  And who  you want to spend the rest of your  life with...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at Dent.  Smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of your life, huh?  That's  a pretty big commitment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if the mob has their way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.  Let's be serious.  What's  your answer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have an answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half the guests are on their cell phones.  An ASSISTANT D turns to his COLLEAGUE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surrillo and Loeb?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a KNOCK at the front door.  Alfred opens it- fin Detective Wuertz, who holds up his badge.  Alfred beckons him in- there is a SHOTGUN at the back of his head held b The Joker- purple suit, make up.  With friends.  The Joke SMASHES Wuertz over the head- steps over him, RACKING the shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good evening.  We're the  entertainment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel is looking at Dent.  Torn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess no answer isn't "no".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Harvey.  I just...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's someone else, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne is moving up behind him.  Fast-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just tell me it's not Wayne.  The  guy's a complete-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel's eyes go wide as Wayne puts Dent in a SLEEPER HOL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent SLUMPS, unconscious in Wayne's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've come for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the main room- A SHOTGUN BLAST followed by SCREAMS. Wayne stuffs Dent in a closet- puts a mop through the han Rushes past Rachel-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay hidden.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker and his THUGS pour into the room, weapons raise

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A THUG appears in front of Wayne, toting a shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands up, pretty boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne FLIPS the shotgun around in the man's hands- uses i as a fulcrum to SNAP his forearm- SMASHES him in the jaw  with the stock without breaking step, field stripping the shotgun and tossing the pieces in different directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker moves through the terrified guests.  Smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only have one question: where is  Harvey Dent? (silence) I'll settle for his loved ones...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A distinguished Gentleman steps into the Joker's path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not intimidated by thugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker stops.  Stares at the man.  SMILES AFFECTIONATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you remind me of my father. (GRABS him) I hated my father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker has his blade in the Gentleman's mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker drops the Gentleman.  Turns to Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, beautiful.  You must be  Harvey's squeeze. (runs his knife across  her cheek) And you are beautiful.  You look  nervous- it's the scars isn't it?   Wanna know how I got them?  I had a  wife, beautiful like you.  Who tells  me I worry too much.  Who says I  need to smile more.  Who gambles.   And gets in deep with the sharks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One day they carve her face, and  we've got no money for surgeries.   She can't take it. (presses knife into  her cheek) I just want to see her smile again.   I just want her to know I don't care  about the scars.  So I put a razor  in my mouth and do this to myself...  And you know what? (starts laughing) She can't stand the sight of me... (or crying) She leaves!  See, now I see the funny  side.  Now I'm always smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne walks in.  A COUPLE are hastily putting themselves  back together, alerted by the noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on out there, Wayne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne doesn't answer.  He walks into a closet and pulls a FALSE WALL.  Wayne steps into the safe room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank god- you've got a panic room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door SLAMS shut and seals with a HISS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait!  You can't-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to be kidding me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker raises his knife from Rachel's cheek.  She SLUG him.  He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little fight in you.  I like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you're going to love me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker turns.  Batman catches him with a BLOW, spins h down and DISARMS him- the Joker's men jump him- Batman ta them out two at a time- DISARMING thugs- BREAKING forearm the Joker CLICKS a BLADE from the toe of his shoe and KIC JABBING BETWEEN THE PLATES OF ARMOR covering Batman's rib

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman HURLS the Joker across the room.  One of the Joker men LUNGES- Batman lays him out cold. The Joker has another knife pressed to Rachel's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.  Just take off your mask and  show us all who you are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel shakes her head at Batman.  The Joker raises his  shotgun to the side and BLOWS OUT the pane of glass next him.  The Joker dangles Rachel out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) Very poor choice of words...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lets her DROP- Rachel falls onto a SLOPING GLASS ROOF- sliding towards the edge.  Batman DIVES after her-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They DROP- Batman FIRES his grapple, SNAGGING Rachel's an activates one wing of his cape- They SPIN and SLOW- Batma envelopes Rachel- they SLAM into the hood of a passing ta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DRIVER SCREAMS as Batman and Rachel hit the roof- ROL down the windshield- onto the pavement.  Alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks back as his car SPEEDS away.  He's breath hard, EXHILARATED.  He touches the blood running down his sweaty white makeup.  SMACKS the back of the driver's sea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do about Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a man of my word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel opens her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's not do that again, okay? (looks around) Is Harvey-?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel lies back, breathing.  Looks up at Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STEPHENS is talking to Gordon, subdued.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim, it's over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As long as they don't get to Lau,  we've cut off their funds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the prosecution's over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No-one's standing up in front of a  Judge while judges and police  commissioners are getting blown away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's got any sense, Dent's halfway  to Mexico by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door BURSTS OPEN.  Dent.  Fire in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where do you keep your trash?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks at Dent.  Impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lau looks up as Dent walks in, holding a bullet proof ves

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're due in court- I need you alive  long enough to get you on the record.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way.  You can't protect me- you  can't even protect yourselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent THROWS the heavy vest at Lau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Refuse to cooperate on the stand-  you won't be coming back here- you'll  go to county.  How long do you  calculate you'll last in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne sits at his video screens- they all play the Joker' video with different IMAGE TREATMENTS and SOUND TUNINGS. Wayne turns to Alfred.  Indicates the screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Targeting me won't get their money  back.  I knew the mob wouldn't go  down without a fight, but this is  different.  They've crossed a line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You crossed it first, sir.  You've  hammered them, squeezed them to the  point of desperation.  And now, in  their desperation they've turned to  a man they don't fully understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne gets up from his monitors, raises the bat-cabinet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Criminals aren't complicated, Alfred.   We just have to figure out what he's  after.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Respectfully, Master Wayne, perhaps  this is a man you don't fully  understand, either. (looks at Wayne) I was in Burma.  A long time ago.   My friends and I were working for  the local government.  They were  trying to buy the loyalty of tribal  leaders, bribing them with precious  stones.  But their caravans were  being raided in a forest north of  Rangoon by a bandit.  We were asked  to take care of the problem, so we  started looking for the stones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But after six months, we couldn't  find anyone who had traded with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you missing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One day I found a child playing with  a ruby as big as a tangerine. (shrugs) The bandit had been throwing the  stones away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why was he stealing them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because he thought it was good sport.   Because some men aren't looking for  anything logical, like money... they  can't be bought, bullied, reasoned  or negotiated with. (grave) Some men just want to watch the world  burn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne stares at Alfred.  Reaches for the bat-suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVING over the city we hear myriad RADIO CALLS going out over the ether.  CLOSE IN on a lonely figure on top of a  skyscraper.  The Batman.  Listening with his million doll earpieces.  From the babble, ONE VOICE EMERGES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your name, sir.  Please state-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8th at orchard.  You'll find Harvey  Dent there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An UNMARKED and a SQUAD CAR screech to a halt.  Gordon an Ramirez get out, lead two UNIFORMS into the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door SMASHES OPEN, Gordon- gun drawn- takes in the sc TWO DEAD MEN sitting at the kitchen table.  They each hav HAND OF CARDS, as if in the middle of a game.  ALL JOKERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and Ramirez STARE at the CRUDE LEERS carved into t faces.  Their DRIVERS LICENSES are pinned to their chests

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check the names.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (checks licenses) Patrick Harvey.  Richard Dent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need ten minutes with the scene  before your men contaminate it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Us contaminate it?  It's because of  you that these guys are dead in the  first place-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands down.  Batman moves past the bodies to the wal Finds an embedded stray bullet.  He pulls a SAWING DEVICE from his belt- THRUSTS it into the wall and starts cuttin around the bullet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's brick- you're gonna try and  take ballistics off a shattered  bullet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Fingerprints.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez looks at Gordon.  Is he serious?  Gordon points-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you're gonna do, do it fast,  'cos we know his next target...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman looks- a campaign poster: RE-ELECT MAYOR GARCIA. Mayor's image has a MANIC CLOWN'S GRIN and "HA,HA,HA".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox is at his desk.  Reese enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can I do for you, Mr. Reese?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You asked me to do the diligence on  the L.S.I. Holdings deal again.  I  found irregularities.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their CEO is in police custody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not with their numbers.  With yours.   A whole division of Wayne Industries  disappeared, overnight.  So I went  down to the archives and started  pulling old files.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out a folded blueprint.  Slides it across the de

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My kids love the Batman.  I thought  he was pretty cool, too.  Out there,  kicking some ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox picks up the piece of paper.  Unfolds it.  It's an ol BLUEPRINT.  The image is unmistakable: THE TUMBLER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Changes things when you know it's  just a rich kid playing dress up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese points to the approval box in the corner of the pag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your project.  Don't tell me you  didn't recognize your baby pancaking  cop cars on the evening news.  Now  you're getting sloppy.  Applied  Sciences was a small, dead department-  who'd notice?  But now you've got  the entire R and D department burning  cash, claiming it's related to cell  phones for the army.  What are you  building him now?  A rocket ship?  I  want ten million a year.  For the  rest of my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox looks at him.  Even.  Folds up the blueprint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me get this straight.  You think  that your client, one of the  wealthiest and most powerful men in  the world, is secretly a vigilante  who spends his nights beating

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: criminals to a pulp with his bare  hands... (deadpan) And now your plan is to blackmail  this person?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese stares at Fox.  Who smiles.  And slides the bluepri across the desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese looks at it.  Then at Fox.  Swallows.  Slides it ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne hands Alfred a RIFLE BULLET scribed with a GRID.  H slots it into a clip, then loads it into a COMPUTER CONTR GATTLING GUN.  He puts on ear protectors.  Hits a button. The rifle WHIRS to life- dollying sideways, BLASTING BULL into a series of identical BRICK WALL SAMPLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure you made it loud enough,  sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the wall samples still smoke, Wayne steps up, carrying the sample from the crime scene.  Comparing its spread to the new samples, he selects two and carries them to an X- SCANNER. The machine gives the samples a 3-axis scan- HI-RES 3-D I of the bullet fragment arrays come up on the screen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same image of the bullet fragment on a screen.  Fox h a key and the computer 'reassembles' the bullets accordin to the identifying grid on each fragment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's your original scan...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bullet fragment array pops on  screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's it reverse-engineered...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox hits a button and the unmarked bullet fragments are  reassembled.  Wayne spins the roughly-shaped bullet puzzl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here's a thumb print.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox looks at the screen, impressed.  Thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make you a copy. (troubled) Mr. Wayne, did you reassign R and D?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  Government telecommunications  project.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't aware we had any new  government contracts.  Can you-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius.  I'm playing this one pretty  close to the chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fair enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox looks at Wayne as he leaves.  Uneasy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne examines the fingerprint-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've run it through all the databases  and came up with four possibles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne gets up to let Alfred sit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cross-reference the addresses.  Look  for Parkside and around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne opens a HYDRAULIC DOOR, revealing a gleaming MV AUG BRUTALE.  As he moves the bike onto the lift...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got one.  Melvin White, aggravated  assault, moved to Arkham twice- 1502  Randolph Apartments, just off State-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overlooking the parade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne and the bike rise on the lift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The avenue has been blocked off.  Onlookers line the  sidewalks.  POLICE march past in dress uniform.  Engel do a stand-up on the sidewalk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With no word from the Batman- even  as they mourn Commissioner Loeb,  these cops have to be wondering if  the Joker is going to make good on  his threat to kill the Mayor today...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the buildings above, POLICE SNIPERS scan the crowd. Gordon keys his radio-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it looking up top?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're tight.  But frankly... there's  a lot of windows up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks up at the myriad buildings overlooking the  podium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne maneuvers the Ducati through the traffic.  He pulls near a parade barricade- dismounts and slips into an alle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some of the building's hard-luck TENANTS eye Wayne as he  counts doors down the hallway.  He finds 1502...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SEA OF POLICE fills the Avenue.  In the center, three  grieving families and an HONOR GUARD.  The Mayor at the  podium.  Gordon behind.  Dent is seated with Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and as we recognize the sacrifice  of these officers, we must remember  that vigilance is the price of safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne enters: EIGHT MEN IN UNDERSHIRTS, bound, gagged,  blindfolded.  A SNIPER SCOPE on a tripod at the window. Wayne moves to the first man, RIPS the tape from his mout

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (breathing hard) Took... they took our guns, our  uniforms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon scans the crowd.  The Mayor wraps up- the Honor Gu steps forward, raises weapons...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A POLICE SNIPER scans the windows of the tenement...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne RACES to the window, looks through the SCOPE to see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE HONOR GUARD TURN THEIR WEAPONS ON THE MAYOR.  One SMI flesh-colored makeup over his scars.  THE JOKER. Gordon LEAPS FORWARD- they FIRE- GORDON TAKES SHOTS TO TH BACK as he SLAMS the Mayor to the ground-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Police Sniper SPOTS Wayne at the window- SHOOTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne DUCKS as SHOTS erupt around the window-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PANDEMONIUM erupts-One of the honor guard is TAGGED IN TH LEG- GOES DOWN.  The others MELT into the CHAOS. On the podium, Stephens rolls Gordon over... he is not mo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHAOS.  Dent approaches an ambulance sitting in the alley Two cops jump out and run over to their commander.  Dent  steps up into the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's thug sits there.  Handcuffed.  A PARAMEDIC  bandages his leg.  Cops run past, barking orders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me what you know about the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's thug looks at Dent.  Smirks.  Dent looks down Exasperated.  Looks back up at the Joker's Thug.  Spots  something- moves closer- the man's uniform... his name ta OFFICER RACHEL DAWES. Dent, breathing hard, looks around: the paramedic jumps o rushing to help a FALLEN OFFICER.  Dent spies the keys in the ignition.  Jumps into the driver's seat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barbara Gordon stands in the doorway, scared.  Stephens a a UNIFORMED OFFICER stand in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Barbara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James Gordon pushes past his mother to look at Stephens. Barbara tries to push him back inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, go play with your sister...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James stays just inside the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barbara stares at Stephens.  Then looks past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you out there?!  Are you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James spots something- Batman, perched in the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You brought this on us!  This  craziness!  You did!  You brought  this...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She collapses into Stephens's arms.  Batman hangs his hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detectives from MCU stand around the lit bat-signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switch it off- he ain't coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He doesn't want to talk to us.  God  help whoever he does want to talk to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strobe lights.  Pounding music.  Maroni is in a booth at side with his MISTRESS.  His bodyguards are around the ta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting over music) Can't we go someplace quieter!  We  can't hear each other talk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't wanna hear you talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (can't hear) What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of Maroni's Bodyguards DROPS- Maroni looks over- in t strobe lights- Batman SAVAGES his bodyguards- people RUN, TERRIFIED.  Maroni starts to get out of his seat- Batman  LANDS like a panther on the table in front of him-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel moves through the chaotic bullpen at MCU- EYEWITNE civilian and cop are being questioned. Rachel's phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey, where are you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INTERCUT with Dent in an INDISTINCT interior setting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where you should be- at Major Crimes  trying to sort through all the-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, listen to me.  You're not  safe there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Gordon's unit, Harvey-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's gone, Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He vouched for these men-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he's gone.  The Joker's named  you next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks around the bullpen.  Eyeing the detectives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, I can't let anything happen  to you.  I love you too much.  Is  there someone, anyone in this city  we can trust?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce.  We can trust Bruce Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel, I know he's your friend but-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, Harvey, Bruce's penthouse  is now the safest place in the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.  Go straight there.  Don't  tell anyone where you're going.   I'll find you there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wider shows us we are-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent hangs up the phone.  TAPED to a chair in front of De the Joker's Thug, blindfolded.  Dent RIPS off the blindfo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni opens his eyes.  Batman is holding him by the coll

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks down) From one professional to another- if  you're trying to scare someone, pick  a better spot.  From this height the  fall wouldn't kill me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm counting on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman lets go.  Maroni FALLS.  And SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni NAILS the pavement.  CLUTCHES at his leg, which is badly broken.  Batman FLIES down, landing over him- hauls him up.  Maroni HOLLERS in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't know, he found us-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He must have friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friends?  You met this guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone knows where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni looks up at Batman.  Sneering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one's gonna tell you anything-  they're wise to your act- you got  rules... the Joker, he's got no rules.   No one's gonna cross him for you.   You want this guy, you got one way.   And you already know what that is.   Just take off that mask and let him  come find you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman DROPS Maroni.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or you want to let a couple more  people get killed while you make up  your mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent shows the Joker's Thug a GUN.  Bullets.  Loads the g SHOVES it in his face-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna play games?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent PUSHES the gun against the thug's head with REAL MAL Pulls it away and FIRES.  The Thug FLINCHES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent puts the gun barrel against the thug's temple-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rattled) You wouldn't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And pulls his lucky coin out of his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  I wouldn't.  That's why I'm not  going to leave it up to me. (shows him coin) Heads- you get to keep your head.   Tails... not so lucky.  So, you want  to tell me about the Joker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thug, scared, says nothing.  Dent FLICKS the coin int the air.  SLAPS it onto the back of his gun hand (aiming  with wrist horizontal).  Dent shows him the coin.  Heads. The Thug exhales, SHAKING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sobbing) I don't know anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not playing the odds, friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent tosses the coin again.  This time IT DOESN'T LAND.   Dent Looks up.  Batman is there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd leave a man's life to chance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His name's Schiff, Thomas.  He's a  paranoid schizophrenic, a former  patient at Arkham.  The kind of mind  the Joker attracts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman moves away from Schiff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do expect to learn from him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is shivering with frustration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker killed Gordon- and, and  Loeb.  He's going to kill Rachel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the symbol of hope that I  could never be.  Your stand against  organized crime is the first  legitimate ray of light in Gotham  for decades.  If anyone saw this,  everything would be undone- all the  criminals you got off the streets  would be released.  And Jim Gordon  will have died for nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman hands Dent his lucky coin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to call a press  conference.  Tomorrow morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one else will die because of me.   Gotham is in your hands, now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't!  You can't give in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Batman is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel watches Gotham through the window.  Wayne enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey called.  He says Batman is  going to turn himself in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You honestly think it's going to  stop the Joker from killing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps not.  But I've got enough  blood on my hands.  I've seen, now,  what I would have to become to stop  men like him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at Wayne.  She cannot help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You once told me that if the day  came when I was finished...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne moves towards her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd be together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bruce, don't make me your one hope  for a normal life-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne takes her in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But did you mean it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kiss.  Then separate.  She looks sadly into his eyes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they won't let us be together  after you turn yourself in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne nods.  Leaves.  She watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred shovels DOCUMENTS into an incinerator- blueprints, designs, files.  He pauses, looking down at a book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even the logs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything that could lead back to  Lucius or Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred tosses the book onto the fire.  STARES at Wayne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are dying, Alfred.  What would  you have me do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred looks into Wayne's eyes with a fearsome gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Endure, Master Wayne.  Take it.   They'll hate you for it, but that's  the point of Batman... he can be the  outcast.  He can make the choice no  one else can face.  The right choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today I've found out what Batman  can't do.  He can't endure this. (rueful smile) Today you get to say II told you  so'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today, I don't want to. (beat) Although I did bloody tell you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne sinks the Bat-suit, Alfred closes the incinerator. They head for the lift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose they'll lock me up as well.   Your accomplice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Accomplice?  I'm going to tell them  the whole thing was your idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They power down, leaving the Bat-bunker in darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A capacity crowd of REPORTERS, COPS, and PUBLIC.  Dent is the podium.  Wayne sits in the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies and Gentlemen, thank you for  coming.  I've called this press  conference for two reasons.  Firstly,  to assure the citizens of Gotham  that everything that can be done  over the Joker killing is being done.   Secondly, because the Batman has  offered to turn himself in-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd REACTS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But first.  Let's consider the  situation: should we give in to this  terrorist's demands?  Do we really  think that-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd rather protect an outlaw  vigilante than the lives of citizens?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd noisily assents.  Dent calmly motions quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batman is an outlaw...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel is watching the press conference on TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But that's not why we're demanding  he turn himself in.  We're doing it  because we're scared.  We've been  happy to let Batman clean up our Streets for us until now-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things are worse than ever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne looks at the Heckler.  At the angry crowd.  Dent le over the podium.  Impassioned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  They are.  But the night is  darkest just before the dawn.  And I  promise you, the dawn is coming. (the crowd quiets) One day, the Batman will have to  answer for the laws he's broken- but  to us, not to this madman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd seems moved by his words, then, a CHANT-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO MORE DEAD COPS!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Appreciative noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHERE IS THE BATMAN?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People take up the chant.  Dent has lost them.  He knows

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So be it. (turns to officers) Take the Batman into custody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At this, a HUSH DESCENDS.  Wayne is sitting towards the b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hungry eyes scan the room.  Wayne starts to rise... DENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.  Wayne stares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel STARES as Dent is arrested on TV.  Appalled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel comes up to Alfred.  Upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is he letting Harvey do this,  Alfred?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  He went down to the  press conference-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And just stood by?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps both Bruce and Mr. Dent  believe that Batman stands for  something more important than a  terrorist's whims, Miss Dawes, even  if everyone hates him for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the sacrifice he's making- to  not be a hero.  To be something more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you're right about one thing-  letting Harvey take the fall is not  heroic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel holds out an ENVELOPE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know Bruce best, Alfred... give  it to him when the time is right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How will I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not sealed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred takes the envelope.  Rachel gives him a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Alfred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Detective unlocks the cell and lets Rachel inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, I didn't have time to  talk this through with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't offer yourself as bait, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're transferring me to central  holding.  This is the Joker's chance,  and when he attacks, Batman will  take him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  This is too dangerous-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Detective knocks.  Dent rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detectives stare at Dent as he is led, shackled, to the  waiting CONVOY.  Stephens begins CLAPPING- a handful join in, but most remain silent.  Rachel follows him to the ba of an armored vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's using you as bait- but he doesn't  know if he can get the Joker- he's  failed so far.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know what he's thinking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat) I just do, okay?  Harvey, this isn't  just about you, what about all the  people counting on you to turn this  city around?  Tell everyone the truth-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent kisses her.  Pulls out his LUCKY COIN-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads I go through with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your life... you don't leave  something like this to chance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent tosses it at her- Rachel catches it.  Looks.  Heads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sincere) I'm not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns it over: IT IS DOUBLE-HEADED.  She looks up- th DOORS CLOSE on his smile.  She shakes her head.  Torn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You make your own luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As SWATS file into the back of the support vehicles-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We get this guy to County and he's  their problem.  The streets along  your route will be cleared.  The  convoy stops FOR NO REASON...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Swat with a shotgun climbs into the cab.  Pulls on his  mask.  Looks over at the DRIVER, who's already wearing hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope you've got some moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy ROCKETS past a roadblock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Swats are staring at Dent, fascinated.  He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Officer holding up traffic.  A TRUCK pulls up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wait like everybody else, pal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHOTGUN BLAST sends the Officer flying.  A second blast illuminates the shooter's face: the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWAT behind the wheel of the lead black-and-white slo as he sees something burning in the intersection ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overhead, a police HELICOPTER checks the route, hovering  above a burning FIRE TRUCK, BLOCKING the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver is all business.  The radio CRACKLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All units, be advised.  All units  will exit down Cheviot west and  proceed north on lower 5th avenue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lower 5th?  We'll be like ducks in a  barrel down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy disappears down the exit ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The convoy rolls through the subterranean streets.  A GAR TRUCK pulls up behind and casually SWIPES the rear vehicl of the convoy off the road...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get us out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver NAILS the gas-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Garbage Truck pushes hard on the armored car, ramming its rear bumper, FORCING it forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver watches the Truck fill his rear view.  Shotgun Swat picks up the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got company back here-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECOND TRUCK SMASHES into the SWAT van at the head of t convoy, SMASHING it through the concrete barriers and INT THE RIVER.  The truck is branded "LAUGHTER" but an "S" ha been sprayed at the front to make "SLAUGHTER" with "HA, H HA" all over the side... The Joker's Truck DODGES between the support columns and  into the oncoming lane- pulls alongside the armored car. The Driver looks over.  The cargo door on the truck slide open.  Inside, the Joker, holding a machine gun. The armored car LOCKS up its brakes, but the garbage truc pushes it forward as the Joker fires- BULLETS slamming in The side of the vehicle-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is calm as the SWATS FLINCH from the bullet indentat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shotgun SWAT STARES at the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker drops his machine gun and picks up an RPG.  He  stops- SEES something up ahead, racing towards the second truck- the BATMOBILE.  The Joker stares, fascinated, as-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -THE BATMOBILE PLOWS STRAIGHT INTO THE SECOND TRUCK- the profile car sending the truck UP INTO THE CONCRETE CEILIN the Batmobile carries on through, as the TRUCK DISINTEGRA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks back to the batmobile, amused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that him-?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone could be driving that thing- stay on Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker lines up his RPG and prepares to fire-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shotgun SWAT's eyes go wide at the Joker's weapon- the Dr JAMS the brakes-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Armored Car CRASHES BACK against the Garbage Truck, BRAKING, SCRAPING, SLOWING just enough- the RPG SLAMS int the SQUAD CAR in front of them and EXPLODES- the armored BURSTS through the fireball and continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batmobile SPINS around to rejoin the pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker turns his men to RELOAD his RPG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do me up-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turns back- levels his RPG out the window.  Aims.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman watches as the Joker prepares to fire.  Several ro of cars separate them.  He toggles the afterburner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two small children in the back of the car watch as the  Batmobile ROCKETS overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker steadies the RPG and FIRES- the Batmobile CRASH down into the open space between the two vehicles- taking the hit from the RPG which EXPLODES-  The rear of the Batmobile EXPLODES- SPINNING the FLAMING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SWATS react to the EXPLOSION.  Dent is calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver takes a DEBRIS HIT to the head-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker CACKLES with delight as he is THROWN AROUND the rear of the trailer-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman WRESTLES the pod controls, SPINNING on the GYRO-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batmobile flips over to come to rest in a smoking hea the front end intact, rear wheels scattered across the  roadway.  A small crowd gathers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker JUMPS down from the truck, still giggling like kid- looks back at the Batmobile's destruction-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoever he was... he ain't now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker YANKS his dead driver out of the cab, JUMPS ove him to take the wheel and pull back onto the roadway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The armored car pulls ahead, the Joker's truck in hot pur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shotgun SWAT glances in the rear view mirror, slaps the d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get topside- we need that air  support!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The armored car PULLS onto a RAMP, heading up.  The Joker Truck follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People stare at the smoking wreck, inching closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman adjusts his position.  Hits a button-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damage catastrophic.  Initiate eject  and self-destruct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arm guards GRAB Batman's forearms as EXPLOSIVE BOLTS FIRE all around the pod...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd JUMPS- PANELS of the front of the car BLOW OUT- The crowd stares, OPEN-MOUTHED, as Batman EMERGES, HOISTE UP AND OUT of the flaming car by the FRONT POD- LEVERING  OVER the FRONT WHEEL... the pod PUSHES the OTHER WHEEL IN FRONT to form a type of MOTORCYCLE- The BAT-POD SHOOTS  FORWARD, bursting free as the Batmobile DETONATES, DYING a MASSIVE FIREBALL... Batman's cape SUCKS TOGETHER, formi a TIGHT PACK on his shoulders, clear of the CHURNING REAR TIRE of the bat-pod...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The armored car races down the street- the CHOPPER dips l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're back on point- and ready to  give some of their own medicine-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cop pulls out an ASSAULT RIFLE.  COCKS it-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker FIGHTS with the truck's gearbox, turns to his T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tee 'em up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thug GRABS his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Joker Thug in clown mask loads up the cable gun seen in the bank heist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another thug loads his own cable gun...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A motorist stares through his rear-view mirror, transfixe as the bat-pod TEARS past.  He YELPS as the bat-pod SMASH the wing mirror from his car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman accelerates, oblivious to the STACCATO of CLEAVED  wing mirrors as the bat-pod RAZORS through traffic- CROSS a BUSY INTERSECTION- The bat-pod CUTS off the crowded low level street, ROARING over into the PARKING LANES-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman squeezes his triggers- BLASTING at PARKED CARS, BL them out of the way, literally CANNONING A PATH for the p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bat-Pod CANNONS through the glass doors and RACES thr the station/mall- COMMUTERS screaming and diving out of t way- The Bat-Pod races up the stairs and onto the upper street

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's Thugs FIRE THE CABLES ACROSS THE STREET AT SE FLOOR LEVEL... they pull TAUT as the Chopper approaches,  unawares... the Chopper CATCHES on the cables, GOING DOWN a FIERY BALL that BARRELS along the street towards the ar car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver steers around the flaming wreckage as the Shot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bat-pod TEARS down a narrow alley blocked with DUMPST CANNONS the dumpsters to make a path-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker hands the wheel to his man- takes a submachine

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks ahead to see the Bat-pod emerge from the  alley in a cloud of fire, SKIDDING SIDEWAYS IMPOSSIBLY- i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess it was him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bat-pod RACES straight at the Joker's truck- FIRES A  HARPOON at the Joker's truck- it IMPACTS low, below the b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's Thug DUCKS, then comes back up, beaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He missed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman SWERVES past the Joker's truck, SLALOMS, wrapping CABLES around a LAMP POST, SPINNING to a halt to watch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cable goes TAUT, RIPPING one post from its foundation the TRUCK'S FRONT WHEELS CATCH, FLIPPING IT END OVER END. The Joker crawls from the wreckage.  He jumps over the me and starts waving his pistol at oncoming traffic.  Batman GUNS the bat-pod and rides it up and over the median.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Driver slows the car, pulls to the side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker walks towards the Bat-pod, which SPEEDS towards him.  He is FIRING his gun RANDOMLY at the oncoming traff

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit me.  Come on.  Hit me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman watches as the Joker holds out his arms.  Waiting impact.  There is no room to go around him. Batman LOCKS UP THE BRAKES. The Joker watches as Batman DUMPS the bike, rather than Smashing into him.  Batman SLAMS into the wall. The Joker's thug reach Batman first.  He is unconscious. The first Thug pulls at the mask.  An ELECTRIC SHOCK from the batsuit THROWS him back.  The Joker LAUGHS.  Flicks h switchblade.  Crouches-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just give me a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gun is COCKED.  The Joker drops the knife.  Sits.  Lo back.  Behind them is the armored car.  The man standing  over him is the Driver.  He pulls off his helmet. It's JIM GORDON.  Back from the dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got you, you son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks up as the door swings open to reveal Gordon.   Dent GRINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lieutenant, you do like to play it  pretty close to the chest...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got him, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent nods.  Respect in his eyes.  They shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small army of cops have sealed off the roadway.  Gordon pulls away in the squad car containing the Joker. REPORTERS clamor for an interview with Dent, who is being helped out of the van by the SWATS.  Ramirez pushes throu the pack, shoving reporters aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him be!  He's been through enough-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent follows Ramirez to a squad car- Wuertz is in the dri seat.  Dent smiles at Ramirez as she opens the rear door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, detective- I've got a date  with a pretty upset fiancГ©e.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured, counselor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez shuts the door on Dent.  Signals Wuertz to pull o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker sits in a holding cage.  His makeup has run, hi clothes a mess- but his calm lends him an odd dignity.  C SMASH their night sticks against the bars near the Joker' head.  The Joker does not flinch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand away!  All of you.  I don't  want anything for his mob lawyer to  use, understand?  Handle this guy  like he's made of glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mayor walks in.  Shakes Gordon's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back from the dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't chance my family's safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mayor looks over at the Joker in his cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.  No matches on prints, DNA,  dental.  Clothing is custom, no  labels.  Nothing in his pockets but  knives and lint.  No name, no other  alias... nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go home, Gordon.  The clown'll keep  till morning.  Get some rest- you're  going to need it.  Tomorrow, you  take the big job. (off look) You don't have any say in the matter. (louder, for all) Commissioner Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops in M.C.U. start CHEERING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon rings the bell.  Barbara answers it, dressed in bl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn't tell you.  I couldn't risk-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SLAPS Gordon.  He grabs her, holds her tight as she s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's men are processed.  In the harsh light, the m look a little ridiculous in their clown make-up.  DETECTI MURPHY turns to Stephens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at these ugly bastards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the men, walks over, clutching at his belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't feel good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a cop killer.  You're lucky  to be feeling anything below the  neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone in his cage, the Joker smiles at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon crouches by his son's beside.  He reaches out to t James Jr's cheek.  James's eyes open.  Staring at his dad if still dreaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers) Did Batman save you, dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks at his son.  A little pride seeps in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, this time I saved him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's phone rings-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon PUSHES through the swarm of detectives crowded int the observation room.  The Joker can be seen through the  glass, as well as on a large MONITOR.  Sitting there.  Ca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has he said anything, yet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez shakes her head.  Gordon PUSHES through a door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker, in near darkness.  Gordon walks in.  Sits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evening, Commissioner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey Dent never made it home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you done with him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs) Me?  I was right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who did you leave him with?  Your  people?  Assuming, of course, that  they are your people not Maroni's... (off look) Does it depress you, Lieutenant, to  know how alone you are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon can't help glancing at the mounted CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does it make you feel responsible  for Harvey Dent's current predicament?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What time is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What difference does that make?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Depending on the time, he might be  in one spot. (smiles) Or several.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stands.  Moves to the Joker.  Undoes his handcuffs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we're going to play games, I'm  going to need a cup of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The good cop, bad cop routine?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon pauses, hand on the doorknob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon steps out.  The overhead lights COME ON.  BATMAN I BEHIND HIM.  The Joker BLINKS in the HARSH WHITE LIGHT. WHAM!  The Joker's face HITS the table- comes up for air- CRACK!  CRACK!  To the head.  Batman is in front of him. The Joker stares, fascinated.  Bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never start with the head... victim  gets fuzzy.  Can't feel the next-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRACK!  Batman's fist SMACKS down on the Joker's fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calm) See?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanted me.  Here I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to see what you'd do.  And  you didn't disappoint... (laughs) You let five people die.  Then you  let Dent take your place.  Even to a  guy like me... that's cold-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those mob fools want you gone so  they can get back to the way things  were.  But I know the truth- there's  no going back.  You've changed things.   Forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why do you want to kill me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker starts LAUGHING.  After a moment he's laughing hard it sounds like SOBBING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill you?  I don't want to kill you.   What would I do without you?  Go  back to ripping off Mob dealers?  No  you... (points) You.  Complete.  Me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're garbage who kills for money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't talk like one of them- you're  not, even if you'd like to be.  To  them you're a freak like me... they  just need you right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He regards Batman with something approaching pity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But as soon as they don't, they'll  cast you out like a leper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks into Batman's eyes.  Searching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their morals, their code... it's a  bad joke.  Dropped at the first sign  of trouble.  They're only as good as  the world allows them to be.  You'll  see- I'll show you... when the chips  are down, these civilized people...  they'll eat each other. (grins) See, I'm not a monster... I'm just  ahead of the curve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman GRABS the Joker and pulls him upright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Detectives moves for the door.  Gordon stops h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman HOISTS the Joker up by the neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have these rules.  And you think  they'll save you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have one rule.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then that's the one you'll have to  break.  To know the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles) The only sensible way to live in  this world is without rules.  Tonight  you're going to break your one rule...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman leans in to the Joker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm considering it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are just minutes left- so,  you'll have to play my little game  if you want to save... (with relish) ...one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a while I thought you really  were Dent, the way you threw yourself  after her-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman DROPS the Joker- RIPS up a bolted-down chair-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon MOVES for the door-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman JAMS the chair under the doorknob- PICKS up the Jo and HURLS him into the two-way glass.  The glass SPIDERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker, bleeding from nose and mouth, LAUGHS at Batman

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at you go... does Harvey know  about you and his-?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker SMASHES into the wall- SLIDES to the floor.  Ba stands over him, a man possessed-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHERE ARE THEY?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He GRABS the Joker, holding him close-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killing is making a choice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman PUNCHES the Joker across the face.  HARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHERE ARE THEY?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker FEEDS off Batman's anger.  Loving it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...you choose one life over the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your friend, the district attorney.   Or his blushing bride-to-be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman PUNCHES the Joker again.  The Joker LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have nothing.  Nothing to threaten  me with.  Nothing to do with all  your strength... (spits a tooth) But don't worry, I'm going to tell  you where they are.  Both of them,  and that's the point- you'll have to  choose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batman stares at the Joker...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's at 250 52nd Boulevard.  And  she's on avenue X at Cicero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman DROPS him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman RACES past Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one are you-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent knew the risks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks back- the Joker is bloody, but grinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several cops see Batman climb onto the bat-pod and TEAR o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman SWERVES into oncoming traffic, CHAOS in his wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and his men SCRAMBLE into their cars...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can anyone hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey Dent opens his eyes.  He's bound to a chair in a d unfurnished basement apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel?  Rachel is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sobbing) Harvey.  You're OK.  I thought...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her voice is coming from a speakerphone on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK, Rachel.  Everything's going  to be just fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around.  Behind him, metal BARRELS, hooked up to car battery, with a TIMER counting down: five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker sits, smiling, content.  Stephens guards the do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want my phone call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many of your friends have I  killed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a twenty year man.  I can tell  the difference between punks who  need a little lesson in manners, and  the freaks like you who would just  enjoy it. (quiet) And you killed six of my friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fat Thug shuffles to the bars, where a COP stands gua

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (agony) Please.  My insides hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step away from the bars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boss said he would make the voices  go away.  He said he would go inside  and replace them with bright lights.   Like Christmas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's great.  Please step-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Fat Thug COLLAPSES.  The Cop grabs his radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel is bound to a chair.  Behind her are barrels ident to the ones behind Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you move your chair?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Harvey, we don't have much time-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The timer connected to the bomb reads 2.47... 2.46...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent DRAGS his chair, inching closer to the barrels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look for something to free yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chair JAMS against a ridge in the floor.  Dent STRAIN to reach the timer.  Inches shy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They said only one of us was going  to make it.  That they'd let our... (pause) Our friends choose...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent strains... THE CHAIR, AND DENT, TOPPLE OVER- KNOCKIN OVER A BARREL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey?  What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent, one side of his face pressed against the bare floor watches the open barrel SPEW DIESEL FUEL around him-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.  I'm trying to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent contorts his head to keep from swallowing any.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bat-pod SKIDS SIDEWAYS, WHEELS FLIPPING as the gyro k Batman upright on the tumbling bike- it comes to rest- gu lined up with a fire exit- BLOWS the door off its hinges- JUMPS off the bike-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gridlock.  Gordon SWERVES onto the sidewalk.  People SCAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker sits like a kid kept after class.  He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know why I use a knife, Detective?   Guns are too quick.  You don't get  to savor all the little emotions.   See, in their last moments, people  show you who they really are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stephens tries hard to ignore him.  It isn't working.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, in a way, I knew your friends  better than you ever did. (smiles) Would you like to know which of them  were really cowards?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rolls up sleeves) I know you're going to enjoy this.   But I'm going to enjoy it more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stephens PUNCHES the Joker in the gut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is half submerged in diesel fuel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey, in case... I want you to  know something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent CHOKES, his emotions overwhelming him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't think like that, Rachel.   They're coming for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, but I don't want them to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel looks at the timer.  Ten seconds left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to live without you.   Because I do have an answer, and my  answer is yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MEDIC CUTS away the Fat Thug's shirt- his belly has lar INCISION, which has been closed with crude looking STITCH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got some kind of... contusion...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RECTANGULAR SHAPE is visible under the skin above his n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stephens shuffles out into the room, a piece of BROKEN GL held to his THROAT by the Joker.  Cops draw their weapons

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my own damn fault.  Just  shoot him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want my phone call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Detectives look at each other.  One of them pulls out his cell phone.  TOSSES it to the Joker, who begins to di

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Medic gingerly PRESSES the rectangle.  It illuminates soft blue light visible through the skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a... phone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker presses SEND.  At the end of the room, the door the holding area EXPLODES-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman SPRINTS down the hall- stops at a door- KICKS it-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cars PULL UP- Gordon gets out, carrying a fire ax-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman KICKS- the door gives- Batman SMASHES it open-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman BURSTS through the door- Dent looks up in horror-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!  Not me... Why did you come for  me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman STARES at Dent.  The Joker lied.  The counter hits Seconds.  Batman DRAGS Dent out- Dent FIGHTS to stay-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RACHEL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey?  Harvey, it's okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RACHEL!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, axe in hand, RUNS towards the entrance-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel can hear Dent.  The counter runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calm) Somewhere-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLAST HURLS Gordon backward onto the hood of his car-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman wraps his cape around Dent and hurls them both thr the door.  Dent is SCREAMING-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon picks himself up.  The warehouse is an inferno.  H heads for it anyway.  Five of his men have to RESTRAIN HI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECOND EXPLOSION- Batman COVERS Dent as the FIREBALL HI them- IGNITING the diesel soaking Dent's left side- he st BURNING.  And stops screaming.  Batman ROLLS Dent on the pavement... Dent SIZZLES.  Silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker walks to the bars of another cell.  Grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In his cell.  Terrified.  Lau.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is wheeled into an ambulance, bandages held to his f His one visible eye STARES BLANKLY, oblivious to the pani

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon watches the fire.  DEBRIS blows across the asphalt Gordon picks up two pieces: SINGED JOKER CARDS.  In place the Joker's face is a PHOTO OF LAU.  A POLICE SERGEANT  approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's alive, Jim.  Just.  But back  at M.C.U.... the Joker's gone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Lau? (the Cop nods) The Joker planned to be caught.  He  wanted me to lock him up in M.C.U..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A squad car BLAZES down the street.  The Joker sticks his head out the window like a dog, feeling the wind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred sits at a table reading the letter from Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dear Bruce, I need to explain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water.  Smoldering blackness.  The FIRE CREWS extinguish last flames of the devastated building.  A FIREMAN nudges his COLLEAGUE, pointing out something in the devastation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I need to be honest and clear.  I'm going to marry Harvey Dent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glimpses of Dent's damaged face as SURGEONS surround him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
