dialogues.text: I love him, I want to spend the rest  of my life with him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Firemen watch a statue-like figure amidst the charred ruins.  The Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I told you that if Gotham no  longer needed Batman we could be  together, I meant it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon surveys the wreckage of MCU.  The bodies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'm not sure the day will come...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman bends to the ground on one knee, his black glove s against the smoldering debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...when you no longer need Batman.   I hope it does, and if it does I  will be there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots something.  DENT'S TWO-HEADED COIN.  Blackened,  SCARRED.  Batman turns it over.  The other side is PRISTI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred reads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but as your friend.  I'm sorry to  let you down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent, heavily bandaged, hooked up to various machines. Batman stands at the foot of his bed.  Watching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you lose your faith in me, please  keep your faith in people...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman puts DENT'S DAMAGED COIN on the bedside table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love, now and always, Rachel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred finishes the letter.  Tears in his eyes, he folds back into its envelope.  Places it on the breakfast tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred moves through the silent space, stepping past the  cowl and gauntlets lying on the cold marble.  He approach Wayne, half-undressed, slumped in a chair, watching Gotha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I prepared a little breakfast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.  Alfred sets down the tray.  The envelope is pro against the silver teapot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Master Wayne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne turns, a desperate look in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I bring this on us?  On her?  I  thought I would inspire good, not  madness-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have inspired good.  But you  spat in the face of Gotham's criminals-  didn't you think there might be  casualties?  Things were always going  to have to get worse before they got  better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Rachel, Alfred...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel believed in what you stood  for.  What we stand for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne looks up at Alfred.  Alfred picks up the cowl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham needs you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham needs its hero.  And I let  the Joker blow him half to hell-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is why for now, they'll have  to make do with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred hands him the cowl.  Wayne looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was going to wait for me.  Dent  doesn't know.  He can never know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred glances at the envelope.  Takes it off the tray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred puts the envelope in his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That bandit, in the forest in Burma...  Did you catch him? (Alfred nods) How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (uneasy) We burned the forest down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A national guard helicopter ROARS over Gotham General.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent.  Bandaged.  Sedated.  Coming up for air.  Sees some on the table: his coin.  He fumbles for it, marvelling at its shiny face.  Remembering. INSERT CUT: RACHEL CATCHES THE COIN. Dent turns the coin over.  The other side is devastated. STARES at the scarred face.  Starts ripping his bandages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred comes up to Wayne.  Points him to the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to see this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On screen: Engel, in his studio, addresses the camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...he's a credible source- an A and  M lawyer for a prestigious  consultancy.  He says he's waited as  long as he can for the Batman to do  the right thing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shot cuts to REESE, nodding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now he's taking matters into his own  hands.  We'll be live at five with  the true identity of the Batman,  stay with us...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon ENTERS.  Dent STARES to one side.  He looks normal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about Rachel. (nothing) The Doctor says you're in agonizing  pain but you won't accept medication.   That you're refusing skin grafts-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember the name you all had for me  when I was at Internal Affairs?   What was it, Gordon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey, I can't-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAY IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's anger makes Gordon flinch.  He looks away.  Ashame

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (small) Two-face.  Harvey two-face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns to face Gordon- the left side of Dent's face i DESTROYED- skin blackened and shriveled.  Molars visible. The eye a ball and socket.  Dent manages a small smile wi the good side of his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why should I hide who I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I know you tried to warn me.   I'm sorry.  Wuertz picked you up-  was he working for them? (nothing) Do you know who picked up Rachel? (nothing) Harvey, I need to know which of my  men I can trust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks at Gordon.  Cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would you listen to me now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  No you're not.  Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon takes a last look at Dent.  Then leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon steps out.  Someone is there.  Maroni.  On crutche Gordon stares at him.  Cold.  Maroni shifts, awkward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This craziness.  This is too much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should have thought of that before  you let the clown out of the box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want him, I can tell you where  he'll be this afternoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen gets out of his SUV.  Looks at a RUSTED HULK. The Chechen, bodyguards, and dogs, head up the gangplank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass into a huge hold.  In the middle: A BILLION DOL The pile is thirty feet high.  Standing on top- the Joker At his feet, bound, is Lau.  The Chechen laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like I say- not so crazy as you look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker jumps from the top, slides down the pile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you- I'm a man of my word. (looks around) Where's the Italian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen shrugs.  Pulls out a cigar.  Lights it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More for us.  What you do with all  your money, Mr. Joker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker GRABS a can of GASOLINE from his thug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a man of simple tastes.  I like  gunpowder.  Dynamite...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is SPLASHING gasoline onto the money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...gasoline...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen, FURIOUS, steps forwards.  The Joker turns.   JABS his gun in the Chechen's face.  The Chechen's bodygu REACT.  The Joker's men DRAW on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you know what they have in common?   They're cheap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you were a man of your word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker PLUCKS the cigar from the Chechen's lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker tosses the cigar at the pile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm only burning my half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chechen watches the money catch fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All you care about is money.  This  city deserves a better class of  criminal, and I'm going to give it  to them.  This is my town now.  Tell  your men they work for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker crouches down to the Chechen's dogs.  They GROW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They won't work for a freak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker takes out a knife.  Tosses it to his man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut him up and offer him to his little  Princes.  Let's show him just how  loyal a hungry dog is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's men GRAB the Chechen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not about money.  It's about  sending a message...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker watches the towering FLAMES.  Lau screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything.  Burns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker pulls out a phone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese has a confident air.  Engel is taking calls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanna how much they're gonna pay  you to say who Batman really is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's simply not why I'm doing this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caller, you're on the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey Dent didn't want us to give  in to this maniac- you think you  know better than him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guy's got a point- Dent didn't want  Batman to give himself up, is this  the right thing to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we could talk to Dent now he might  feel differently-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we wish him a speedy recovery.   God knows we need him, now.  Let's  take another call-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Reese, what's more valuable: one  life, or a hundred?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess it would depend on the life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK.  Let's say it's your life.  Is  it worth more than the lives of  several hundred others?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad you feel that way.  Because  I've put a bomb in one of the city's  hospitals.  It's going off in sixty  minutes unless someone kills you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a concerned citizen- (drops pitch to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -and regular guy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and his men are gearing up to take down the Joker. Detective turns up the TV in the bullpen-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had a vision.  Of a world without  Batman.  The mob ground out a little  profit and the police tried to shut  them down, one block at a time...  and it was so... boring.  I've had a  change of heart.  I don't want Mr.  Reese spoiling everything, but why  should I have all the fun?  Let's  give someone else a chance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese looks around, twitching.  Sweating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If Coleman Reese isn't dead in sixty  minutes, then I blow up a hospital.   Of course, you could always kill  yourself, Mr. Reese.  But that would  be the noble thing to do.  And you're  a lawyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The line rings off.  Engel is speechless. Gordon turns to the uniform COPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call in every officer- tell them to  head to their nearest hospital and  start evac and search.  Call the  transit authority, school board,  prisons- get every available bus  down to a hospital- the priority is  Gotham General- wheel everybody out  of that place right now- my hunch is  that's where the bomb is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's where Harvey Dent is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Uniforms SPRINT off.  Gordon turns to his Detectives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On screen: Reese is a deer in the headlights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To get Reese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne and Alfred move to the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need you plugged in, checking  Gordon's men and their families.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hospital admissions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you be taking the batpod, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the middle of the day?  Not very  subtle, Alfred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lamborghini then. (watches Wayne go) Much more subtle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne's Lamborghini TEARS through downtown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHAOS.  PATIENTS and STAFF running around.  COPS and TRAF WARDENS try to manage the evacuation.  The COPS stationed outside Dent's room, look around, unsure-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, are you going to help?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Cops move to help wheel gurneys around the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and his men escort Reese out of the elevator- Enge follows with a camera crew.  As they approach the glass d Gordon looks out at an angry crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commissioner?!  You really think  someone would try to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon SPOTS an OLD MAN raising a PISTOL- Gordon THROWS R to the ground as SHOTS SHATTER the laminated glass of the lobby.  The Crowd SURGES in all directions-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the cars around back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon hauls Reese to the stairwell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne SLOWS past the chaos outside the television station

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw O'Brien and Richards...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred types at the computer station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing on them.  No immediate family  members admitted to a Gotham hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon pulls the shaken Reese down the stairs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaken) They're trying to kill me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and into a police VAN...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon throws Reese in the back.  Smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, maybe Batman will save you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van PEELS out.  Heads onto the streets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops load patients onto BUSES.  A TV van pulls up, Engel his Cameraman jump out.  One of Dent's guards, POLK, look into a SCHOOL BUS.  Turns to the Cop loading it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, don't put anyone else on. (gets on radio) Davis, I got space, bring him out. (no answer) Davis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Polk heads back towards the hospital, against the flow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne trails the police van from a distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw Burns and Zachary... and a  patrolman I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burns is clean... Zachary...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's at least one I don't know-  send the information to Gordon-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's phone BEEPS.  He looks at a text: WATCH OUT.  CO WITH RELATIVES IN GOTHAM HOSPITALS- BURKE, RAMIREZ, TILL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Polk enters the room.  No Davis.  Just a REDHEADED NURSE, back towards him, reading Dent's chart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma'am, we're going to have to move  him, now. (nothing) Ma'am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Redhead TURNS- it is the Joker, silenced pistol in ha He FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lamborghini zips around a car to get closer to the va

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon is reading his phone: ERIKSON, BERG.  Gordon looks sharply.  Considers the uniformed cop nervously fingering his shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Berg, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The young cop, BERG, looks up.  Sweating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commissioner?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay, son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Berg nods.  Looks at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker draws closer to Dent's bed.  Dent STRAINS at th leather cuffs binding him to the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want there to be any hard  feelings between us, Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker loosens Dent's restraints.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you and Rachel were being  abducted I was sitting in Gordon's  cage.  I didn't rig those charges-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your men.  Your plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I really look like a guy with a  plan, Harvey?  I don't have a  plan...The mob has plans, the cops  have plans.  You know what I am,  Harvey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's hand is TREMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a dog chasing cars... I wouldn't  know what to do with one if I caught  it.  I just do things.  I'm just the  wrench in the gears.  I hate plans.   Yours, theirs, everyone's.  Maroni  has plans.  Gordon has plans.   Schemers trying to control their  worlds.  I'm not a schemer, I show  the schemers how pathetic their  attempts to control things really  are.  So when I say that you and  your girlfriend was nothing personal,  you know I'm telling the truth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands him the pistol.  Dent holds it to the Joker's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne ROARS past a line of traffic to settle in a few car back from the police van, sitting at a red light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne studies the intersection- spots a PICKUP jostling f position on the cross street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon watches Berg, mentally tracing the trajectory of h shotgun barrel as Berg fiddles with his gun.  Gordon star trying to subtly unholster his own weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna need your weapon, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Berg looks at Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne watches the driver of the pickup staring intently a the police van.  Lining it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese looks from Berg to Gordon.  Berg looks at Gordon,  trembling, the barrel of his gun inching lower in the car

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Because my wife's in hospital?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  That would be why.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker leans in, pressing his head to the gun's barrel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the schemers who put you where  you are.  You were a schemer.  You  had plans.  Look where it got you.   I just did what I do best- I took  your plan, and I turned it on itself.   Look what I've done to this city  with a few drums of gas and a couple  of bullets.  Nobody panics when the  expected people get killed.  Nobody  panics when things go according to  plan, even if the plan is horrifying. If I tell the press that tomorrow a  gangbanger will get shot, or a  truckload of soldiers will be blown  up, nobody panics.  Because it's all  part of the plan.  But when I say  that one little old mayor will die,  everybody loses their minds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Introduce a little anarchy, you upset  the established order and everything  becomes chaos.  I'm an agent of chaos.   And you know the thing about chaos,  Harvey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks into the Joker's eyes.  Finding meaning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks down at the coin in his hands.  Turns it over, feels it's comforting weight.  Shows the Joker the good s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns the coin over.  The flip side is deeply SCARRED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks at the coin.  Looks at Dent, admiringly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent FLICKS the coin into the air.  Catches it.  Looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light turns GREEN.  The police van pulls into the  intersection- the pickup GUNS IT, RACING AT IT...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne FLOORS it, YANKS the wheel to pull up onto the side

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Berg licks his lips, nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Reese?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pickup BARRELS at the van, FULL TILT- at the last sec Wayne's Lamborghini SLIPS alongside the van- the pickup

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the van JOLTS with the impact Gordon LEAPS forward, PU UP Berg's shotgun barrel, which FIRES into the roof- Gord SMASHES Berg on the head with his sidearm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's men pull the pickup driver from his cab- Gordon  crouches down to the Lamborghini wreck to help pull Wayne from the car.  Gordon recognizes him as he pulls him free

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay, Mr. Wayne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne looks at him, woozy.  Sits on the curb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me Bruce.  I think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was a brave thing, you did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trying to catch the light?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You weren't protecting the van?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne turns- sees the police van as if for the first time Reese steps down, dazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Who's in it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reese locks eyes with Wayne.  Nods.  Gordon sizes up Bruc Wayne and his crushed sports car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't watch a whole lot of news,  do you, Mr. Wayne?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs) It can get a little intense.  Think  I should go to hospital?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not today, I wouldn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker walks calmly through the mostly deserted buildi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he walks he pulls a DETONATOR from his pocket.  Stroll along he PUSHES THE BUTTON... STAGGERED EXPLOSIONS BURST  INTO THE CORRIDOR BEHIND HIM LIKE DEMOLITION BLASTS... th Joker just walks out the door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker STROLLS down the steps- WINDOWS BLOW OUT IN SER People DIVE for cover- Engel PILES into a school bus- The Joker walks across the parking lot- THE BUILDING  COLLAPSING BEHIND HIM...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon hears the EXPLOSION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham general... (grabs his phone) Did you get Dent out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cop cowers as DEBRIS and SMOKE BLAST across the stree

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker gets onto the bus.  Nods at his man at the whee

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes are on the collapsed building.  One school bus p out from the line of other buses.  Heads down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An empty neighborhood dive, the local DRUNK passed out at the bar, BARTENDER, watching BREAKING NEWS on the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet Jesus.  D'you see this, Mike?   They blew up a hospital...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective Wuertz, at a booth looks up at the TV, bored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shouldn't you be out there, you know,  doing something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my day off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bartender shuts the register.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta take a leak, keep an eye on  things, will ya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bartender steps out.  The back door OPENS again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?  You need me to shake it for-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He TRAILS off as someone sticks a gun in his face: Harvey Dent.  Standing in shadow.  He sits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent, I thought you was...dead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent leans into the light.  The left side of his face is  HIDEOUSLY BURNED, cheek gone, blackened teeth and gums.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent picks up Wuertz's drink.  Takes a SIP.  Wuertz watch the bare muscles RETRACT as Dent SWALLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who picked up Rachel, Wuertz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It must've been Maroni's men-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent SLAMS the glass back on the table- Wuertz FLINCHES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, of all people, are gonna protect  the other traitor in Gordon's unit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know- he'd never tell me. (stares at Dent) I swear to God, I didn't know what  they were gonna do to you-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny, I don't know what's going to  happen to you, either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent pulls his coin from his pocket.  FLIPS it.  Wuertz  watches it SPIN.  It lands on the table.  Scarred side up The drunk at the bar STIRS at the GUNSHOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon, manic, surveys the scene with a Cop-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must know how many were inside- you've got patient lists, roll calls-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir!  Sir.  Take a look at what we're  dealing with.  Cops, National Guard- (gestures at buses) We're showing 50 missing- but that  building was clear.  These buses are  heading off to other hospitals- my  guess is we missed one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?  What's your guess about where  Harvey Dent is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cop says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep looking.  Keep it to yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox is watching the news.  His intercom buzzes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Fox?  Security is showing a break- in at the R and D department.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox watches two security men force the door.  He enters a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox enters the dimly-lit room.  At one end is an extraord array of thousands of tiny monitors.  Fox approaches,  fascinated, as they quietly display architectural pattern individually and in concert.  The images become a MAP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beautiful.  Isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox nods, staring at the monitors as Batman approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beautiful.  Unethical.  Dangerous.   You've turned every phone in the  city into a microphone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius presses a key.  The BABBLE of a MILLION CONVERSATI at once fills the room.  Every cell phone in the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And high frequency generator/receiver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the phone I gave you in Hong  Kong.  You took my sonar concept and  applied it to everybody's phone in  the City.  With half the city feeding  you sonar you can image all of Gotham. (turns to Batman) This is wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to find this man, Lucius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But at what cost?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The database is null-key encrypted.   It can only be accessed by one person.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one should have that kind of power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why I gave it to you.  Only  you can use it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius looks at Batman.  Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spying on thirty million people wasn't  in my job description.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman points to a TV screen.  Fox turns.  ON SCREEN: the Joker shakes his head above a graphic "LATEST THREAT"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does it take to make you people  want to join in..?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon watches a screen.  Grave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You failed to kill the lawyer...  I've got to get you off the bench  and into the game.  So, here it is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bar, packed with business people watches the TV.  SIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come nightfall, this city is mine,  and anyone left here plays by my  rules.  If you don't want to be in  the game, get out now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bar patrons start moving... The Joker reaches for the cam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the bridge-and-tunnel crowd are  in for a surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO STATIC.  The bar patrons look around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox turns from the TV to look at Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox stares at Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the audio sample.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He plugs a USB dongle into the console.  A sample of the  Joker's voice from the call-in news program plays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he talks within range of any phone  in the city, you'll be able to  triangulate his position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius toggles a menu.  The city is an open book- People  working, eating, sleeping.  Lucius shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you've finished, type your name  to switch it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help you this one time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius sits at the console.  Batman moves off-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But consider this my resignation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman turns.  Fox looks at him, serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As long as this machine is at Wayne  Industries, I won't be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gothamites POUR out of the city, on foot and by car... th BRIDGES and TUNNELS are deserted, but for BOMB SQUAD sear teams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon briefs the Mayor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My officers are going over every  inch of the tunnels and bridges, but  with the Joker's threat they're not  and option.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Land routes East?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Backed up for hours.  Which leaves  the ferries with thirty thousand  waiting to board.  Plus, corrections  are at capacity, so I want to use a  ferry to take some prisoners off the  island.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men you and Dent put away?  Those  aren't people I'm worried about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should be- they're the people  you least want to be stuck with in  an emergency.  Whatever the Joker's  planning, it's a good bet that  Harvey's prisoners might be involved.   I want 'em out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the ferry terminal, National Guardsman watch over the  THIRTY THOUSAND jostling, scared people waiting to board two MASSIVE FERRIES to Seven Sisters.  Grumbles turn to Y as 800 PRISONERS are loaded onto a ferry by shotgun-totin CORRECTIONS OFFICERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That ain't right!  We should be on  that boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to ride across with them,  be my guest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni climbs into the back of a limo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni settles back into his seat.  The car pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't stop for lights, cops, nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going to join your wife?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni STARTS.  Someone is in here with him.  Harvey Dent Two Face- leans forward, clutching a pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You love her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you imagine what it would be  like to listen to her die?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it up with the Joker.  He killed  your woman.  Made you... like this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker's just a mad dog.  I want  whoever let him off the leash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni looks at Dent.  Worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I took care of Wuertz, but who was  your other man inside Gordon's unit? Who picked up Rachel?  It must've  been someone she trusted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I tell you, will you let me go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can't hurt your chances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was Ramirez.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls out his coin.  Dent cocks the pistol...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you said-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said it couldn't hurt your chances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent FLIPS it.  Looks: good side.  He shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucky guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maroni looks confused.  Dent FLIPS the coin again.  Looks down at the coin.  Shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent smiles.  PUTS HIS SEAT BELT ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your driver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent presses the barrel of the revolver behind the shadow the driver.  Maroni LUNGES, SCREAMING.  Dent FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Limo SWERVES off of the bridge, SOARS out over the ca and PANCAKES into the RETAINING WALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CIVILIANS CRAM their way onto one ferry.  Finally, the  COMMANDER of the National Guard unit SIGNALS to his men t STOP BOARDING and CAST OFF. The two FERRIES set off across the river, heading for the lights of the distant shore of the mainland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIRST MATE looks out the window, at the second ferry. It is DEAD in the WATER.  He turns to the PILOT [PRISON  FERRY].

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've lost their engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get on the radio and tell 'em we'll  come back for them once we dump these Scumbags-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the control panel FLICKERS and DIES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get down to the engine room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Mate skirts around the PRISONERS and CORRECTION OFFICERS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Mate opens the door to the engine room.  STOPS. HUNDREDS OF BARRELS OF DIESEL FUEL.  And a small, wrapped PRESENT, topped with a BOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pilot [Prison Ferry] is holding the small present.  H radio CRACKLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same thing over here- enough diesel  to blow us sky high.  And a present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman sits on the bat-pod, cape blowing.  Listening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox?  There's something going on on  the ferries...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As cold scared Families watch, the NATIONAL GUARD COMMAND UNWRAPS that ferry's present.  Inside, he finds a crude R DETONATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would they give us the detonator  to our own bomb?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up in the wiring at the ceiling, a CELL PHONE taped in to the P.A. rings and answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tonight, you're all going to be part  of a social experiment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius Fox looks up as the console CHIMES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm zeroing in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the magic of diesel fuel and  ammonium nitrate, I'm ready right  now to blow you all sky high.  Anyone  attempts to get off their boat, you  all die...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His voice is on the ferry, but that's  not the source...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman looks out, across the entire city skyline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have a location on the Joker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's west...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman FIRES UP the bat-pod- his cape SHRINKS into its pa form as he PEELS OUT, ROARING into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we're going to make things a  little more interesting than that.  Tonight, we're going to learn a little  bit about ourselves...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barbara Gordon answers the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barbara, it's Anna Ramirez-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, Anna-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen carefully, there's no time.  Jim needs you to pack up and get the  kids in the car right away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the units outside-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barbara, those cops can't be trusted. Jim needs you away from them as soon  as possible.  I'll call them off for 10 minutes, you'll have to move fast-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But where-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to give you an address-  Jim will meet you there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez is holding the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 250, 52nd street.  Leave as soon as  the patrol car pulls out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is holding a gun at Ramirez's head.  She hangs up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She believe you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ramirez nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She trusts you.  Just like Rachel  did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't know-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'What they were gonna do'?  You're  the second cop to say that to me.   What, exactly, did you think they  were going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry- they got me early on.  My  mother's medical bills and my-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent FLIPS his coin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I took a little from them- once  they've got you, they keep you.  I'm  sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks at his coin.  Good side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Live to fight another day, officer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent CRACKS her on the head with his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pilot [Prison Ferry] tries the radio.  It's DEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He killed the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no need for all of you to  die.  That would be a waste.  So  I've left you both a little present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker stares out over the harbor, at the ferries.  Ta into a cell phone.  Holding a detonator, with TWO BUTTONS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each of you has a remote to blow up  the other boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Prisoners and Corrections Officers listen.  Appalled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At midnight, I blow you all up.  If,  however, one of you presses the  button, I'll let that boat live.   You Choose.  So who's it going to be- Harvey Dent's most wanted scumbag  collection... or the sweet innocent  civilians?   (beat) Oh, and you might want to decide  quickly, because the people on the  other boat may not be quite so noble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker HANGS UP.  The Pilot [Prisoner Ferry] looks dow at the remote in his hands.  Prisoners begin YELLING and  PUSHING.  The WARDEN takes the remote from the Pilot- COC his shotgun.  His men level their weapons at the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks out at the ferries.  His phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have the Joker's location-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman ROARS along on the bat-pod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prewitt building.  Assemble on the  building opposite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The National Guard Commander is holding the remote.  Seve passengers take a step towards him.  He PULLS his weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BUSINESSMAN clutching his briefcase speaks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you to decide?  We ought to  talk it over, at least.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other passengers agree.  A MOTHER with two KIDS speaks up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't all have to die.  Why should  my babies die?  Those men had their  chance-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not talking about this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're talking over the same exact  thing on the other boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they're even bothering to talk.   Let's put it to a vote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Prisoners grow angrier, a CORRECTIONS OFFICER FIRE his shotgun into the air.  The Prisoners back off.  Sligh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GUARDSMAN on this boat passes around a hat.  People dro CHITS into it.  Passengers filling out chits eye each oth People on their phones say goodbye to loved ones. The Pilot [Passenger Ferry] looks out across the water to the other Ferry.  Looks up at the clock.  Ten to midnight STARES down at his blank chit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and his SWAT team leaders set up SNIPER and SCOPE  positions on the balustrade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SWAT stands beside the empty school bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've found our missing bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks at the SWAT LEADER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we have a hostage situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look across at the large windows of the Prewitt Buil The Joker's men, in crude, homemade CLOWN MASKS are clear visible, automatic weapons in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got hostages!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look through his scope.  Crouched deeper in the room PATIENTS, DOCTORS, and NURSES, huddled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a shooting gallery.  Why'd he  choose a spot with such big windows?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He likes the view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman gestures towards the view of the ferries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have clear shots on five clowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snipers take them out, smash the  windows- a team rappels in, a team  moves in by the stairwells.  2 or 3  or three casualties, max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (barely hesitates) Let's do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not that simple.  With the Joker,  it never is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's simple, is that every second  we don't take him, those people on  the ferries get closer to blowing  each other up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That won't happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then he'll blow them both up!  There's  no time- we have to go in now-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's always a catch with him-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why we can't wait- we can't  play his games-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need five minutes.  Alone-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  There's no time.  We have clear  shots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon pulls his gun.  Batman turns back.  The SWATS watc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent's in there with them.  We have  to save Dent!  I have to save Dent! (to SWAT Leader) Get ready-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman LEAPS from the building, OPENS his cape- SOARS acr the gulf between the two buildings- Gordon puts his weapo away.  Curses softly.  Turns to the SWAT leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two minutes.  Then you breach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman LANDS against the glass two floors below-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox.  I need picture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fox hits some keys-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got POV. on alpha channel,  omni on beta-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SMOKED GLASS EYEPIECES slip down over Batman's eye holes. Batman's SONAR POV.: the layers of the building dissolve, levels of TRANSPARENCY PULSING rhythmically... Batman can see the people inside the building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker is standing by the window, looking out at his  handiwork.  The Chechen's DOGS start BARKING.  He SMILES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman reaches into his utility belt, SPRAYS PLASTIC onto the glass- lets it harden- PUNCHES the window-which BREAK QUIETLY as the pieces stick to the laminate- he slips ins

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman's eyes glow white as he uses his sonar to look THR the corner: AN ARMED CLOWN IS LEANING AGAINST THE CORNER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A six man SWAT team prepares to rappel from the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SWAT team moves up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon's phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?  Barbara, calm down-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Jim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey?  What the hell's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're about to know what my suffering  is really like...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks across at the Prewitt penthouse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?  Where's my family?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where my family died.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Click.  Gordon looks at the SWAT leader.  Pale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Team.  Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon moves to the door off the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman GRABS the Armed Clown, drops him, silently.  He go to disarm him- THE WEAPON IS DUCT-TAPED TO THE CLOWN'S HA Batman RIPS off the clown mask: STARING, FRIGHTENED EYES- MOUTH DUCT-TAPED SHUT... it's E Batman looks up: Four more clowns line the windows, weapo duct-taped to their hands.  On SONAR: he looks into where the hostages are crouched... the "PATIENTS" and "DOCTORS" are carrying weapons- these are the Joker's men... Above  them SWATS RAPPEL FROM THE ROOFTOP.  In the stairwells, t more teams prepping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't.  Move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engel nods, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWATS line up the clowns in their sights...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWAT team arrives at the penthouse fire exit.  They s CHARGES across the inner wall-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWAT Leader checks his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!  Go!  Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SWAT Sniper zeroes in on a clown- the clown DISAPPEARS- the Sniper looks up, confused-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman yanks the clown along the floor using his grapple the clown takes down the two next to him- Batman leaps fo the nearest two as SHOTS SHATTER the glass-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SWATS rappel down the building- SWING in through the  broken windows-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "hostages" reel from the BLAST- The SWATS SWOOP in, a weapons at the clowns, throwing PERCUSSION GRENADES- Batm takes out the SWATS with fists and BATARANGS- The last SW aims at BATMAN- behind him a "DOCTOR" raises a shotgun... behind the "Doctor" Batman can see through the wall at SW preparing to breach... Batman VAULTS over the SWAT into a two-foot kick into the "Doctor's" chest-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Swats BLAST OUT THE WALL- the team leader steps up to the hole... the BAT-GRAPPLE FIRES out-lodging in his kevl vest... he is YANKED, SCREAMING, through the door.  The r of his team look at each other.  Steel themselves.  Move through the hole...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the SWATS race in they find Engel, terrified, next to pile of unconscious "hostages", and their team leader, on end of an absailing rope tied around his waist.  Batman i on them, weaving KICKING, PUNCHING, and, with one hand,  clipping carabinners looped to the absailing rope onto th webbing of vests. Batman steps back- picks up the team leader- SWAT weapons aim at him- he hurls the Team Leader out the window... th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SWATS watch him go... the rope pays out... one by one the are YANKED out of the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SNIPER watches through his scope as the six man SWAT te soars out of the window and drops.  The line snaps taut a they hang, like a mountaineering team in crisis.  Batman, crouched in the broken window, secures the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell's he doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman looks right at the sniper- Raises his grapple gun- BAM.  The bat grapple smashes into the Sniper's scope- th rifle is YANKED out of his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman races past a dazed Engel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pathetic) Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...into the main office.  The Joker is there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came.  I'm touched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the detonator?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dogs LEAP at Batman- SMASH him to the ground...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pilot [Passenger Ferry] finishes counting the votes. Reads the verdict.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tally is 196 votes against. (looks down) And 340 votes for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers avoid eye contact with each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Corrections Officers are in a phalanx in the corner,  facing off against hundreds of menacing Prisoners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you wanna die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Warden and his men look at each other.  At the clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman WRESTLES with the Rotweilers- a blinding mass of  Batman, black fur and bared teeth- The Joker POPS a switchblade.  Moves in to the mass- Batm KICKS OFF the last of the dogs- the Joker JABS his knife  into Batman's RIBS-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the old familiar places.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman recoils in pain.  The Joker BUTTS him- KNEES him- ENERGY explodes from his lean frame- he KICKS the injured Batman back towards the glass...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pilot [Passenger Ferry] looks at the remote in his ha

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I voted for it.  Same as most of  you.  Doesn't seem right that we  should all die...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone calls out from the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't say I'd do it.  Don't forget.   We're still here.  Which means they  haven't killed us, yet, either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sets the remote down on a bench in the front of the lo The other passengers and guardsmen stare at it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HUGE, TATTOOED PRISONER pushes his way to the front.  H walks towards the Warden, who is sweating, looking at the remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't wanna die.  But you don't  know how to take a life.  Give it to  me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Warden looks at the remote.  At the clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These men will kill you and take it,  anyway.  Give it to me, you can tell  people I took it by force... give it  to me and I'll do what you should  have done ten minutes ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone stares at the remote.  One minute left.  The  Businessman stands.  Walks over and picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one wants to get their hands dirty.   Fine.  I'll do it.  Those men on  that boat made their choices.  They  chose to murder and steal.  It makes  no sense for us to die, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the other passengers.  No one makes eye conta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Warden slowly hands him the REMOTE.  The Prisoner loo at it.  He looks the Warden in the eye... Then TOSSES the remote out the window. Warden, prisoners and officers are stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman FLIES backwards THROUGH THE WINDOW- glass flying- Joker KICKS out a wooden brace holding up the STEEL FRAME Batman's arms fly up as it comes crashing down onto his n saved by his protective gauntlets.  Batman GRUNTS as the  Joker STEPS onto the steel beam...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we don't stop fighting, we're  going to miss the fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There won't be any fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman STRUGGLES to keep the beam from CRUSHING his neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Businessman stares at the remote in his hands.  Final he puts it down.  Sits down.  Waits to die. The clock strikes MIDNIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman indicates the clock... twelve o'clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you hoping to prove?  That  deep down, we're all as ugly as you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks at the clock...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Passengers brace.  Look at the clock.  Confused...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The smile disappears from the Joker's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker CROUCHES down, hovering above Batman's face and arms.  Shows him the remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't rely on anyone these days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker ARMS the remote...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have to do everything yourself.  I  always have- and it's not always  easy... (smiles, remembering) You know how I got these scars?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  But I know how you get these-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman's SCALLOP BLADES FIRE OUT OF HIS GAUNTLET, nailing the Joker in the chest and arm- he STAGGERS back- Batman, freed, leaps forward- KICKS HIM OVER THE EDGE- GRABS the  remote- The Joker GIGGLES as he FALLS, enjoying the ride.  Someth SLAMS into his leg, and he JERKS to a stop- BATMAN'S GRAP The Joker HOLLERS in pain as Batman HAULS him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just couldn't let me go, could you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess this is what happens when an  unstoppable force meets an immovable  object.  You truly are incorruptible,  aren't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman secures the Joker UPSIDE DOWN.  The Joker is LAUGH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You won't kill me out of some  misplaced sense of self- righteousness... and I won't kill  you because you're too much fun.   We're going to do this forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be in a padded cell, forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we can share it.  They'll need  to double up, the rate this city's  inhabitants are losing their minds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This city just showed you it's full  of people ready to believe in good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker looks up at him.  A twinkle in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Till their spirit breaks completely.   Until they find out what I did with  the best of them.  Until they get a  good look at the real Harvey Dent,  and all the heroic things he's done. (indicates ferry) Then those criminals will be straight  back onto the streets and Gotham  will understand the true nature of  heroism. (off look) You didn't think I'd risk losing the  battle for the soul of Gotham in a  fist fight with you?  You've got to  have an ace in the hole.  Mine's  Harvey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman hauls the Joker up, nose to nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I took Gotham's white knight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I brought him down to my level.   It wasn't hard- madness is like  gravity.  All it takes is a little  push.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joker laughs.  Batman leaves him to the SWATS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucius.  Find Harvey Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon gets out of his car, gun drawn.  Makes his way int the blackened wreck of a building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon peers into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No reply.  Gordon makes his way deeper.  Up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon spots Barbara and their two children huddled toget He moves towards them- Barbara is shaking her head- WHAM!  Dent cracks Gordon over the head with his gun.  De disarms Gordon, rolls him over.  He turns to look at the  ENORMOUS hole in the floor.  From this side, in the moonl Dent looks completely normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where they brought her,  Gordon.  After your people handed  her over.  This is where they bound  her.  This is where she suffered.   This is where she died.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.  I was here.  Trying to save  her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent TURNS, revealing his dark side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you didn't, did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, you could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you'd listened to me- if you'd  stood up against corruption instead  of doing your deal with the devil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was trying to fight the mob-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent MOVES towards Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't dare try to justify  yourself if you knew what I'd lost.   Have you ever had to talk to the  person you love most, wondering if  you're about to listen to them die?   You ever had to lie to that person?   Tell them it's going to be all right,  when you know it's not?  Well, you're  about to find out what that feels  like.  Then you'll be able to look  me in the eye and tell me you're  sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns- steps over to Barbara- puts the gun to her te

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey.  Put the gun down.  You're  not going to hurt my family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, just the person you need most. (cocks gun) So is it your wife?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the gun down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent moves the gun to point at Gordon's little girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, Harvey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent moves to James Gordon.  Brushes the hair out of the  boy's eyes with the muzzle.  Gordon SNAPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamit.  Stop pointing that gun at  my family, Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a winner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent pulls the boy away from his mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Jim stop him!  Don't let him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent walks James past Gordon to the edge of the burnt flo He touches the raw wood at the edge of the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Harvey.  For everything.   But, please.  Please don't hurt him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cop cars descend on the warehouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks at Gordon, FURIOUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You brought your cops?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All they know is there's a situation.   They don't know who, or what.  They're  just creating a perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I want to escape?!  There's No escape from this-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent indicates his face.  His suffering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one needs to escape, because no  one's done anything wrong.  And nobody  has to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent chuckles.  A macabre sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've done plenty wrong, Gordon.   Just not quite enough.  Yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent squeezes the gun a little tighter against the little boy's neck.  The boy WHIMPERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't want to hurt the boy, Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent turns.  Batman steps from the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not about what I want.  It's  about what's fair. (to Gordon and Batman) You thought we could be decent men  in an indecent world.  You thought  we could lead by example.  You thought  the rules could be bent but not  break... you were wrong.  The world  is cruel. (shows his coin) And the only morality in a cruel  world is chance.  Unbiased.   Unprejudiced.  Fair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing fair ever came out of the  barrel of a gun, Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shows the coin) His boy's got the same chance she  had.  Fifty-fifty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman steps closer, desperate, trying to reach Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to Rachel wasn't chance.   We decided to act.  We three.  We  knew the risks and we acted as one.   We are all responsible for the  consequences.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent looks at Batman.  Pleading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why was it only me who lost  everything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman looks into Dent's eyes.  Emotional.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wasn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious) The Joker chose me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you were the best of us.  He  wanted to prove that even someone as  good as you could fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bitter) And he was right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you're fooling yourself if you  think you're letting chance decide.   You're the one pointing the gun,  Harvey.  So point it at the people  who were responsible.  We all acted  as one.  Gordon.  Me.  And you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent is listening, the wheels in his deranged mind turnin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fair enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent eases his grip on the boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points the gun at Batman.  FLIPS the coin.  TAILS.  He SHOOTS.  Batman COLLAPSES to the ground, clutching his gu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points the gun at his own head.  FLIPS the coin.  HEAD He looks a little disappointed. Finally, he points the gun back at Gordon's son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your turn, Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right, Harvey.  Rachel's death Was my fault.  But punish me-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm about to.  Tell your son it's  going to be all right, Gordon.  Lie.   Like I lied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks up.  Pained.  Locks eyes with his son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's going to be all right, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dent FLIPS the coin.  High.  Dent's eyes FOLLOW the coin Batman HURLS himself at Dent and the boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three of them VANISH over the edge.  A TERRIBLE CRASH then silence, but for the sound of DENT'S COIN, SPINNING the floor at the edge of the hole. Gordon, horrified, RUNS to the edge- peers down- Dent lie at the bottom of the hole, his neck broken.  DEAD. The coin stops spinning, GOOD SIDE UP. Gordon's son swings into view, HANGING from Batman, who i holding onto a JOIST with all his strength... Gordon reaches down to GRAB his son- HAULS him up... Batman FALLS..., dropping and dropping, SMASHING THROUGH  protruding WOOD and PIPES... He lands HARD near Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cops prepare to STORM the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon races down the stairs.  Rushes over to Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, is he okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon crouches at Batman's side.  The Batman GRASPS Gord arm.  STAGGERS to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank-you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and Batman stare down at Dent's body.  Grave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Joker won.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stares down at SCARRED SIDE of Harvey Dent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harvey's prosecution, everything he  fought for, everything Rachel died  for.  Undone.  Whatever chance Gotham  had of fixing itself... whatever  chance you gave us of fixing our  city... dies with Harvey's reputation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We bet it all on him.  The Joker  took the best of us and tore him  down.  People will lose all hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  They won't. (looks at Gordon) They can never know what he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (incredulous) Five dead?  Two of them cops?  We  can't sweep that under-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  But the Joker cannot win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman crouches to Dent's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotham needs its true hero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gently, he turns Dent's head so the good side of his face up.  Gordon looks from Dent's face to Batman.  Understand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You?  You can't-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman stands.  Faces Gordon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You either die a hero or live long  enough to see yourself become the  villain.  I can do those things  because I'm not a hero, like Dent.   I killed those people.  That's what  I can be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angry) No, you can't!  You're not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman hands Gordon his police radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm whatever Gotham needs me to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a hero.  Not the hero we deserved-  the hero we needed.  Nothing less  than a knight.  Shining...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll hunt you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll hunt me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll condemn me, set the dogs on  me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...because it's what needs to happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because sometimes the truth isn't  good enough...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...sometimes, people deserve more.

dialogues.speaker: DESTRUCT WARNINGS". THEN DIES. FOX SMILES TO HIMSELF.
dialogues.text: Batman hurries off.  LIMPING into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James RUNS down the stairs to join father-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why's he running, Dad?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stares after Batman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because we have to chase him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cops race into the buildings the DOGS get the scent an pull away from the doorway, following the SHADOW into the stacks of shipping containers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James looks at his father, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't do anything wrong!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon stares after the Batman.  The sound of the dogs  becoming louder and more ferocious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why, dad?  Why?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batman LURCHES between shipping containers.  STUMBLIN BLEEDING.  He makes it to the bat-pod...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...he's the hero Gotham deserves...  but not the one it needs right now.  So we'll hunt him, because he can  take it.  Because he's not our hero...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bat-pod streaks through Gotham's underground streets, the Batman's cape fluttering behind.  A wraith...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...he's a silent guardian, a watchful  protector... a dark knight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Batman races up a ramp into a blinding light- CUT TO BLACK. CREDITS. END.
